;##################################################
;##### Perfect Spy 
;##### Main 
;##### Shared 
;##### Events & Messages 
;##### Intros & Extra money for neighbouring factions 
;##### Characters Setup 
;##### Difficulty Settings 
;##### Player Setup 
;##### AI Setup - Money and Troops 
;##### AI Setup - Settlement Expansion 
;##### Faction: Dunland 
;##### Faction: Gundabad 
;##### Faction: Enedwaith 
;##### Faction: High Elves 
;##### Faction: Lorien
;##### Script: Rhun Dragon Relic
;##### Script: Dwarven Grudges
;##### Script: Theoden 
;##### Script: Denethor
;##### Script: Aragorn RPG 
;##### Script: Barrow Downs 
;##### Script: Buildings & Settlements 
;##### Script: Corsair Invasions
;##### Script: Dorwinion Choice
;##### Script: Bree Choice 
;##### Script: Ered Luin Ring Choice 
;##### Script: Unite the Clans - Rhun 
;##### Script: Unite the Clans - Harad 
;##### Script: Blue Wizards
;##### Script: Ar-Adunaim KP Bonus
;##### Script: Ent Forest 
;##### Script: Edhellond Reclaiming 
;##### Script: Elven Alliance 
;##### Script: Constant War 
;##### Script: Gandalf 
;##### Script: Glittering Caves 
;##### Script: Last Stand 
;##### Script: Money 
;##### Script: Moria Reclaiming (M) 
;##### Script: Spoils of War 
;##### Script: UI & Videos 
;##### Script: Weakened Factions
;##### Script: One Ring (M) 
;##### Script: Nazguls 
;##### Dynamic Garrison 
;##### Battle AI 
;##### Wait Monitors 
;######################################################

script

    restrict_strat_radar false

	
    ;############################### Perfect Spy ################################
	;monitor_event CharacterSelected IsFactionLeader
     ;   console_command toggle_perfect_spy
    ;end_monitor
	
    ;############################### Main ################################

    declare_counter seasons_counter

	;In the following "seasons_counter" value, set it to -1 if you want 1st turn to be winter or to 0 for 1st turn to be summer
    set_counter seasons_counter 0
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        set_event_counter imperial_campaign 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart
        set_event_counter is_the_ai 1
        set_event_counter ithil_allied 1
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter AI_growth 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter AI_growth 0
	end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        set_event_counter is_the_ai 0
        inc_counter seasons_counter 1
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter = 4
            set_counter seasons_counter 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter = 0
            console_command season winter
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter seasons_counter >= 1
            console_command season summer
        end_if
        set_event_counter mordor_rhun_allied 0
        set_event_counter mordor_harad_allied 0
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 0
        set_event_counter dale_allied_dwarves 0
        set_event_counter khand_is_allied 0
        set_event_counter nd_peace_gondor 1
        set_event_counter nd_peace_amroth 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionCultureType northern_european
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily > Allied
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark > Allied
        set_event_counter ithil_allied 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction khand = Allied
        set_event_counter khand_is_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction venice = Allied
        set_event_counter mordor_rhun_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = Allied
        set_event_counter mordor_harad_allied 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	     if not I_LocalFaction russia 
            console_command diplomatic_stance denmark russia war
            console_command diplomatic_stance sicily russia war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england russia allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia allied
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	     if not I_LocalFaction gundabad			
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad poland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad portugal allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad hre allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance gundabad timurids war
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	     if I_LocalFaction norway
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway scotland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway mongols allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway ireland allied
            console_command diplomatic_stance norway timurids allied
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	     and I_TurnNumber = 30
	     if not I_LocalFaction timurids	
            console_command diplomatic_stance timurids norway allied
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 25
	     if not I_LocalFaction timurids
            console_command diplomatic_stance hre timurids war
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction mongols = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction moors = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_dwarves 1
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction mongols = Allied
        set_event_counter dale_allied_elves 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily = AtWar
        set_event_counter nd_peace_gondor 0
        set_event_counter nd_peace_amroth 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark = AtWar
        set_event_counter nd_peace_gondor 0
        set_event_counter nd_peace_amroth 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
             set_event_counter nd_angmar_dead 1
			 terminate_monitor
		end_if	 
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction normans = Allied
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_normans == 0
        add_events
        event counter turks_allied_normans
        date 0
        end_add_events
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_normans == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction normans > Allied
        set_event_counter turks_allied_normans 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction milan = Allied
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_milan == 0
        add_events
        event counter turks_allied_milan
        date 0
        end_add_events
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_milan == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction milan > Allied
        set_event_counter turks_allied_milan 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction timurids = Allied
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_timurids == 0
        add_events
        event counter turks_allied_timurids
        date 0
        end_add_events
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_timurids == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction timurids > Allied
        set_event_counter turks_allied_timurids 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction byzantium = Allied
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_byzantium == 0
        add_events
        event counter turks_allied_byzantium
        date 0
        end_add_events
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_byzantium == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction byzantium > Allied
        set_event_counter turks_allied_byzantium 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction scotland = Allied
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_scotland == 0
        add_events
        event counter turks_allied_scotland
        date 0
        end_add_events
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
        and I_EventCounter turks_allied_scotland == 1
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction scotland > Allied
        set_event_counter turks_allied_scotland 0
    end_monitor

    ;############################## Shared ###############################

    ;##### Tile seen
    declare_counter tileseen_blocked

    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd
        set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Temporary Spotter's Test (WIP)

    declare_counter umbar_invasions_count
    declare_counter crypts_spawns
    declare_counter gor_spawns
    declare_counter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion
    declare_counter sieges_testing

    monitor_event MultiTurnMove I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
        and HighestAttSharedChar Unorthodoxy named_character = 1
        set_counter sieges_testing 0
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count = -1
            and I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
            and I_CompareCounter gor_spawns = -1
            and I_CompareCounter elven_alliance_MordorInvasion = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;######################### Events & Messages #########################

    ;##### Barracks Event Check
    ; Since I added this in 0.3, people stopped complaining about the event not being fired.
    ; Then it has been removed because it was considered unnecessary and the problem is back again.
    ; Keep it here. It's harmless, it's lightweight, it's short lasting, it prevents fails at 100%.
    ; Granted win/win situation, no jokes and everybody will be happy.
	
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber = 65
        if I_EventCounter large_city_barracks = 0
            historic_event large_city_barracks
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Cities

    declare_counter aztecs_lost_capital
    declare_counter aztecs_sieged_capital
    declare_counter byzantium_lost_capital
    declare_counter byzantium_sieged_capital
    declare_counter denmark_lost_capital
    declare_counter denmark_sieged_capital
    declare_counter england_lost_blackgate
    declare_counter england_lost_capital
    declare_counter england_lost_minasmorgul
    declare_counter england_sieged_blackgate
    declare_counter england_sieged_capital
    declare_counter england_sieged_minasmorgul
    declare_counter ents_lost_capital
    declare_counter ents_sieged_capital
    declare_counter france_lost_capital
    declare_counter france_sieged_capital
    declare_counter gundabad_lost_capital
    declare_counter gundabad_sieged_capital
    declare_counter hre_lost_capital
    declare_counter hre_sieged_capital
    declare_counter goblin_lost_capital
    declare_counter goblin_sieged_capital
    declare_counter hungary_lost_capital
    declare_counter hungary_sieged_capital
    declare_counter ireland_lost_capital
    declare_counter ireland_sieged_capital
    declare_counter khand_lost_capital
    declare_counter khand_sieged_capital
    declare_counter milan_lost_capital
    declare_counter milan_lost_hornburg
    declare_counter milan_sieged_capital
    declare_counter milan_sieged_hornburg
    declare_counter mongols_lost_capital
    declare_counter mongols_sieged_capital
    declare_counter moors_lost_capital
    declare_counter moors_sieged_capital
    declare_counter normans_lost_capital
    declare_counter normans_sieged_capital
    declare_counter norway_lost_capital
    declare_counter norway_messages_unlocked
    declare_counter norway_sieged_capital
    declare_counter poland_lost_capital
    declare_counter poland_sieged_capital
    declare_counter portugal_lost_capital
    declare_counter portugal_sieged_capital
    declare_counter russia_lost_capital
    declare_counter russia_sieged_capital
    declare_counter saxons_lost_capital
    declare_counter saxons_sieged_capital
    declare_counter scotland_lost_capital
    declare_counter scotland_sieged_capital
    declare_counter sicily_lost_cairandros
    declare_counter sicily_lost_capital
    declare_counter sicily_lost_hennethannun
    declare_counter sicily_lost_ostithil
    declare_counter sicily_lost_pelargir
    declare_counter sicily_lost_westernosgiliath
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_cairandros
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_capital
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_hennethannun
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_ostithil
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_pelargir
    declare_counter sicily_sieged_westernosgiliath
    declare_counter spain_lost_capital
    declare_counter spain_sieged_capital
    declare_counter teutonic_order_lost_capital
    declare_counter teutonic_order_sieged_capital
    declare_counter timurids_lost_capital
    declare_counter timurids_sieged_capital
    declare_counter turks_lost_capital
    declare_counter turks_sieged_capital
	declare_counter turks_lost_fornost
    declare_counter turks_sieged_fornost
    declare_counter venice_lost_capital
    declare_counter venice_sieged_capital

    set_counter norway_lost_capital 1
    set_counter sicily_lost_ostithil 1
    set_counter turks_lost_fornost 1
	
	;######## Boromirs epic speech ##########
	monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName East_Osgiliath
		if not I_LocalFaction sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_SettlementOwner East_Osgiliath = sicily
			historic_event boromir_speech event/boromir_speech.bik
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if not I_LocalFaction aztecs
            if I_SettlementOwner Dunland = aztecs
                if I_CompareCounter aztecs_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	dunlending_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	201, 315
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 201, 315
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter aztecs_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Dunland
                    and I_CompareCounter aztecs_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	dunlending_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	201, 315
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 200, 314
                    reveal_tile 200, 315
                    reveal_tile 200, 316
                    reveal_tile 201, 314
                    reveal_tile 201, 315
                    reveal_tile 201, 316
                    reveal_tile 202, 314
                    reveal_tile 202, 315
                    reveal_tile 202, 316
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter aztecs_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Dunland
                    set_counter aztecs_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Dunland = aztecs
                and I_CompareCounter aztecs_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	dunlending_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	201, 315
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 201, 315
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter aztecs_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction byzantium
            if I_SettlementOwner Dorwinion = byzantium
                if I_CompareCounter byzantium_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	dorwinion_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	441, 339
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 441, 339
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter byzantium_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Dorwinion
                    and I_CompareCounter byzantium_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	dorwinion_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	441, 339
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 440, 338
                    reveal_tile 440, 339
                    reveal_tile 440, 340
                    reveal_tile 441, 338
                    reveal_tile 441, 339
                    reveal_tile 441, 340
                    reveal_tile 442, 338
                    reveal_tile 442, 339
                    reveal_tile 442, 340
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter byzantium_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Dorwinion
                    set_counter byzantium_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Dorwinion = byzantium
                and I_CompareCounter byzantium_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	dorwinion_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	441, 339
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 441, 339
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter byzantium_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction denmark
            if I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = denmark
                if I_CompareCounter denmark_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	amroth_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	243, 189
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 243, 189
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter denmark_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
                    and I_CompareCounter denmark_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	amroth_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	243, 189
                    end_add_events
                    reveal_tile 242, 188
                    reveal_tile 242, 189
                    reveal_tile 242, 190
                    reveal_tile 243, 188
                    reveal_tile 243, 189
                    reveal_tile 243, 190
                    reveal_tile 244, 188
                    reveal_tile 244, 189
                    reveal_tile 244, 190
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter denmark_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
                    set_counter denmark_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = denmark
                and I_CompareCounter denmark_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	amroth_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	243, 189
                end_add_events
                reveal_tile 243, 189
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter denmark_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction saxons
            if I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                if I_CompareCounter saxons_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	imladris_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	246, 384
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 246, 384
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter saxons_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Imladris
                    and I_CompareCounter saxons_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	imladris_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	246, 384
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 245, 383
                    reveal_tile 245, 384
                    reveal_tile 245, 385
                    reveal_tile 246, 383
                    reveal_tile 246, 384
                    reveal_tile 246, 385
                    reveal_tile 247, 383
                    reveal_tile 247, 384
                    reveal_tile 247, 385
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter saxons_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Imladris
                    set_counter saxons_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                and I_CompareCounter saxons_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	imladris_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	246, 384
                end_add_events
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                reveal_tile 246, 384
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                set_counter saxons_lost_capital 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            if I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                if I_CompareCounter england_lost_capital = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	mordor_capital_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	372, 232
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 372, 232
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter england_lost_capital 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Gorgoroth
                    and I_CompareCounter england_sieged_capital = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	mordor_capital_siege
                        date		0
                        position	372, 232
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 371, 231
                    reveal_tile 371, 232
                    reveal_tile 371, 233
                    reveal_tile 372, 231
                    reveal_tile 372, 232
                    reveal_tile 372, 233
                    reveal_tile 373, 231
                    reveal_tile 373, 232
                    reveal_tile 373, 233
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter england_sieged_capital 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Gorgoroth
                    set_counter england_sieged_capital 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                and I_CompareCounter england_lost_capital = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	mordor_capital_lost
                    date		0
                    position	372, 232
                end_add_events
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                reveal_tile 372, 232
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                set_counter england_lost_capital 1
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Morgul_Vale = england
                if I_CompareCounter england_lost_minasmorgul = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	mordor_minasmorgul_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	339, 221
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 339, 221
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter england_lost_minasmorgul 0
                end_if
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Morgul_Vale
                    and I_CompareCounter england_sieged_minasmorgul = 0
                    add_events
                        event historic	mordor_minasmorgul_siege
                        date		0
                        position	339, 221
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 338, 220
                    reveal_tile 338, 221
                    reveal_tile 338, 222
                    reveal_tile 339, 220
                    reveal_tile 339, 221
                    reveal_tile 339, 222
                    reveal_tile 340, 220
                    reveal_tile 340, 221
                    reveal_tile 340, 222
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter england_sieged_minasmorgul 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Morgul_Vale
                    set_counter england_sieged_minasmorgul 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Morgul_Vale = england
                and I_CompareCounter england_lost_minasmorgul = 0
                add_events
                    event historic	mordor_minasmorgul_lost
                    date		0
                    position	339, 221
                end_add_events
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                reveal_tile 339, 221
                campaign_wait 0.1
                hide_all_revealed_tiles
                set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                set_counter england_lost_minasmorgul 1
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
                if I_CompareCounter england_lost_blackgate = 1
                    add_events
                        event historic	mordor_blackgate_reclaim
                        date		0
                        position	346, 250
                    end_add_events
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 1
                    reveal_tile 346, 250
                    campaign_wait 0.1
                    hide_all_revealed_tiles
                    set_counter tileseen_blocked 0
                    set_counter england_lost_blackgate 0

    ;##### Intros & Extra money for neighbouring factions

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_LocalFaction hre		
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction milan
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction mongols
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction normans			
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction poland
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction venice
        end_if		
        if not I_LocalFaction normans
        end_if			
        if I_LocalFaction scotland
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction sicily
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction venice
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor


    ;##### Leaders

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType aztecs
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event aztecs_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType byzantium
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event byzantium_king_event
    end_monitor

        and not FactionIsLocal

        historic_event russia_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType saxons
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event saxons_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType scotland
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event scotland_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType sicily
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event sicily_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType spain
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event spain_king_event
    end_monitor


    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType teutonic_order
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event teutonic_order_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType timurids
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event timurids_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType turks
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event turks_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType venice
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event venice_king_event
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType gundabad
        and not FactionIsLocal
        historic_event gundabad_king_event
    end_monitor	
	
    ;##### Mazarbul Book

    set_event_counter mazarbul_book_unlocked 0

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName East_Moria
        and TargetFactionType norway
        and CultureType eastern_european
        and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists mazarbul_book
        set_event_counter mazarbul_book_unlocked 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Power

    declare_counter ents_power
    declare_counter ents_diminishes
    declare_counter france_power
    declare_counter france_diminishes
    declare_counter gundabad_power
    declare_counter gundabad_diminishes
    declare_counter poland_power
    declare_counter poland_diminishes
    declare_counter aztecs_power
    declare_counter aztecs_diminishes
    declare_counter byzantium_power
    declare_counter byzantium_diminishes
    declare_counter denmark_power
    declare_counter denmark_diminishes
    declare_counter england_power
    declare_counter england_diminishes
    declare_counter hre_power
    declare_counter hre_diminishes
    declare_counter hungary_power
    declare_counter hungary_diminishes
    declare_counter ireland_power
    declare_counter ireland_diminishes
    declare_counter khand_power
    declare_counter khand_diminishes
    declare_counter milan_power
    declare_counter milan_diminishes
    declare_counter mongols_power
    declare_counter mongols_diminishes
    declare_counter moors_power
    declare_counter moors_diminishes
    declare_counter normans_power
    declare_counter normans_diminishes
    declare_counter norway_power
    declare_counter norway_diminishes
    declare_counter portugal_power
    declare_counter portugal_diminishes
    declare_counter russia_power
    declare_counter russia_diminishes
    declare_counter saxons_power
    declare_counter saxons_diminishes
    declare_counter scotland_power
    declare_counter scotland_diminishes
    declare_counter sicily_power
    declare_counter sicily_diminishes
    declare_counter spain_power
    declare_counter spain_diminishes
    declare_counter teutonic_order_power
    declare_counter teutonic_order_diminishes
    declare_counter timurids_power
    declare_counter timurids_diminishes
    declare_counter turks_power
    declare_counter turks_diminishes
    declare_counter venice_power
    declare_counter venice_diminishes

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        ;if not I_LocalFaction aztecs
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs < 2
            and I_CompareCounter aztecs_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dunlending_diminish
            set_counter aztecs_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements aztecs >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter aztecs_power = 0
            historic_event dunlending_expand
            set_counter aztecs_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction byzantium
        if I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium < 3
            and I_CompareCounter byzantium_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dorwinion_diminish
            set_counter byzantium_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter byzantium_power = 0
            historic_event dorwinion_expand
            set_counter byzantium_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction denmark
        if I_NumberOfSettlements denmark < 2
            and I_CompareCounter denmark_diminishes = 0
            historic_event amroth_diminish
            set_counter denmark_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements denmark >= 8
            and I_CompareCounter denmark_power = 0
            historic_event amroth_expand
            set_counter denmark_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction england
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england < 5
            and I_CompareCounter england_diminishes = 0
            historic_event mordor_diminish
            set_counter england_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england >= 20
            and I_CompareCounter england_power = 0
            historic_event mordor_expand
            set_counter england_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction france
        if I_NumberOfSettlements france < 1
            and I_CompareCounter france_diminishes = 0
            historic_event isengard_diminish
            set_counter france_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements france >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter france_power = 0
            historic_event isengard_expand
            set_counter france_power 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements gundabad < 1
            and I_CompareCounter gundabad_diminishes = 0
            historic_event gundabad_diminish
            set_counter gundabad_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements gundabad >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter gundabad_power = 0
            historic_event gundabad_expand
            set_counter gundabad_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction hre
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hre < 2
            and I_CompareCounter hre_diminishes = 0
            historic_event orcs_diminish
            set_counter hre_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hre >= 11
            and I_CompareCounter hre_power = 0
            historic_event orcs_expand
            set_counter hre_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction hungary
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hungary < 3
            and I_CompareCounter hungary_diminishes = 0
            historic_event bluedwarves_diminish
            set_counter hungary_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements hungary >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter hungary_power = 0
            historic_event bluedwarves_expand
            set_counter hungary_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction ireland
        if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland < 2
            and I_CompareCounter ireland_diminishes = 0
            historic_event galadhrim_diminish
            set_counter ireland_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter ireland_power = 0
            historic_event galadhrim_expand
            set_counter ireland_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction khand
        if I_NumberOfSettlements khand < 4
            and I_CompareCounter khand_diminishes = 0
            historic_event khand_diminish
            set_counter khand_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements khand >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter khand_power = 0
            historic_event khand_expand
            set_counter khand_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction milan
        if I_NumberOfSettlements milan < 4
            and I_CompareCounter milan_diminishes = 0
            historic_event rohan_diminish
            set_counter milan_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements milan >= 14
            and I_CompareCounter milan_power = 0
            historic_event rohan_expand
            set_counter milan_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction mongols
        if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols < 2
            and I_CompareCounter mongols_diminishes = 0
            historic_event thranduil_diminish
            set_counter mongols_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements mongols >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter mongols_power = 0
            historic_event thranduil_expand
            set_counter mongols_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction moors
        if I_NumberOfSettlements moors < 2
            and I_CompareCounter moors_diminishes = 0
            historic_event erebor_diminish
            set_counter moors_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements moors >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter moors_power = 0
            historic_event erebor_expand
            set_counter moors_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction normans
        if I_NumberOfSettlements normans < 4
            and I_CompareCounter normans_diminishes = 0
            historic_event shire_diminish
            set_counter normans_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements normans >= 11
            and I_CompareCounter normans_power = 0
            historic_event shire_expand
            set_counter normans_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction norway
        if not I_LocalFaction norway
            and I_NumberOfSettlements norway < 1
			and I_CompareCounter norway_diminishes = 0
            historic_event khazad_diminish
            set_counter norway_diminishes 1
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction norway
            and I_NumberOfSettlements norway = 1
			and I_CompareCounter norway_diminishes = 0
			and I_CompareCounter khazad_western_cleared = 1	
            historic_event khazad_diminish
            set_counter norway_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements norway >= 6
            and I_CompareCounter norway_power = 0
            historic_event khazad_expand
            set_counter norway_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction poland
            if I_TurnNumber >= 5
                if I_NumberOfSettlements poland < 3
                    and I_CompareCounter poland_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event shadow_diminish
                    set_counter poland_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements poland >= 15
            and I_CompareCounter poland_power = 0
            historic_event shadow_expand
            set_counter poland_power 1
        end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction portugal
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal < 3
            and I_CompareCounter portugal_diminishes = 0
            historic_event angmar_diminish
            set_counter portugal_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal >= 12
            and I_CompareCounter portugal_power = 0
            historic_event angmar_expand
            set_counter portugal_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction russia
			if I_NumberOfSettlements russia < 2
				if I_TurnNumber >= 5
					and I_CompareCounter russia_diminishes = 0
					historic_event umbar_diminish
					set_counter russia_diminishes 1
				end_if
			end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements russia >= 7
			and I_CompareCounter russia_power = 0
			historic_event umbar_expand
			set_counter russia_power 1
		end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction saxons
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons < 3
            and I_CompareCounter saxons_diminishes = 0
            historic_event lindon_diminish
            set_counter saxons_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter saxons_power = 0
            historic_event lindon_expand
            set_counter saxons_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction scotland
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scotland < 4
            and I_CompareCounter scotland_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dale_diminish
            set_counter scotland_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scotland >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter scotland_power = 0
            historic_event dale_expand
            set_counter scotland_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction sicily
        if I_NumberOfSettlements sicily < 10
            and I_CompareCounter sicily_diminishes = 0
            historic_event gondor_diminish
            set_counter sicily_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements sicily >= 22
            and I_CompareCounter sicily_power = 0
            historic_event gondor_expand
            set_counter sicily_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction spain
          if not I_LocalFaction khand
            if I_TurnNumber >= 1
                if I_NumberOfSettlements spain < 4
                    and I_CompareCounter spain_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event harad_diminish
                    set_counter spain_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
		  end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements spain >= 12
            and I_CompareCounter spain_power = 0
            historic_event harad_expand
            set_counter spain_power 1
        end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
        if I_NumberOfSettlements teutonic_order < 4
            and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_diminishes = 0
            historic_event enedwaith_diminish
            set_counter teutonic_order_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements teutonic_order >= 13
            and I_CompareCounter teutonic_order_power = 0
            historic_event enedwaith_expand
            set_counter teutonic_order_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction timurids
        if I_NumberOfSettlements timurids < 4
            and I_CompareCounter timurids_diminishes = 0
            historic_event anduin_diminish
            set_counter timurids_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements timurids >= 10
            and I_CompareCounter timurids_power = 0
            historic_event anduin_expand
            set_counter timurids_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        ;if not I_LocalFaction turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements turks < 2
            and I_CompareCounter turks_diminishes = 0
            historic_event dunedain_diminish
            set_counter turks_diminishes 1
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements turks >= 9
            and I_CompareCounter turks_power = 0
            historic_event dunedain_expand
            set_counter turks_power 1
        end_if
        ;end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction venice
            if I_TurnNumber >= 1
                if I_NumberOfSettlements venice < 4
                    and I_CompareCounter venice_diminishes = 0
                    historic_event rhun_diminish
                    set_counter venice_diminishes 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements venice >= 15
            and I_CompareCounter venice_power = 0
            historic_event rhun_expand
            set_counter venice_power 1
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_conditions I_TurnNumber = 590
        spawn_army
			faction russia
			character	Gimilkhad, named character, age 34, x 210, y 271,
			traits		NumenoreanRace 1, AIBoost 1, Drink 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PoliticsSkill 1, PietyStarter 1
			unit		Azrazair Archers				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Azrazair Archers				exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Azrazair Archers				exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
			unit		Azrazair Archers				exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		end			
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    ;########################## Characters Setup #########################

    declare_counter keep_ancillary

    monitor_event CharacterSelected not IsFactionHeir
        and HasAncType heir_item
        if I_LocalFaction england
            console_command remove_ancillary this servant_eye
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction ireland
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction mongols
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            console_command remove_ancillary this book_bilbo
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            console_command remove_ancillary this prince_dwarves
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction saxons
            console_command remove_ancillary this light_earendil
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction sicily
            console_command remove_ancillary this writings_isildur
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction spain
            console_command remove_ancillary this spear_fuinur
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction venice
            console_command remove_ancillary this scatha_gold
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction timurids
            console_command remove_ancillary this beorning_heir
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction aztecs
            console_command remove_ancillary this wulf_axe
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction gundabad
            console_command remove_ancillary this mace_angbad
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction portugal
            console_command remove_ancillary this blade_carndum
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction russia
            console_command remove_ancillary this kings_banner
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction poland
            console_command remove_ancillary this relic_sword
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            console_command remove_ancillary this clan_staff
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected IsFactionLeader
        and HasAncType king_special
        if I_LocalFaction france
            set_counter keep_ancillary 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Shire_North = france
                and I_SettlementOwner Shire_West = france
                and I_SettlementOwner Shire_South = france
                set_counter keep_ancillary 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter keep_ancillary = 0
                console_command remove_ancillary this chief_shire
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
            console_command remove_ancillary this king_mountain
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            console_command remove_ancillary this highlord_khazaddum
        end_if
    end_monitor

    declare_counter give_moria_to_hre
	declare_counter game_easy
	declare_counter game_medium
	declare_counter game_hard
	declare_counter game_very_hard

        and CampaignDifficulty = easy
		set_counter game_easy 1
        console_command add_money 3000
        if I_LocalFaction aztecs

        end_if

                    unit		Dunedain Rangers				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement dunedain_attackers_2, Lake_Evendim, attack
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Lonehills = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction turks
                    character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 207, y 365, direction W, label dunedain_attackers_3
                    traits		DunedainRace 1, DunedainRanger 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAmbusher 7, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 1
                    unit		Dunedain Bodyguard					exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Cardolan Sentinels			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Cardolan Sentinels			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Cardolan Riders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0					
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement dunedain_attackers_3, Lonehills, attack
            end_if		
        end_if			
        if not I_LocalFaction venice
            if I_SettlementOwner Morad = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction venice
                    character	random_name, named character, age 26, x 463, y 266, direction W, label rhun_attackers_1
                    traits		BadManRace 1, AruladClan 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAdministrator 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                    unit		Loke Rim Bodyguard			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonguard		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Daritai Clansmen			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement rhun_attackers_1, Morad, attack
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Southern_Rhun = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction venice
                    character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 437, y 263, direction W, label rhun_attackers_2
                    traits		BadManRace 1, AruladClan 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 1
                    unit		Loke Rim Bodyguard			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonguard		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Daritai Clansmen			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement rhun_attackers_2, Southern_Rhun, attack
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Kelepar = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction venice
                    character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 480, y 324, direction W, label rhun_attackers_4
                    traits		BadManRace 1, BalchothClan 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 1
                    unit		Loke Rim Bodyguard			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonguard		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonriders			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement rhun_attackers_4, Kelepar, attack
            end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Farest_Rhun = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction venice
                    character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 380, y 252, direction W, label rhun_attackers_5
                    traits		BadManRace 1, DaritaiClan 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 1
                    unit		Loke Rim Bodyguard			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonguard		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Arulad Dragonriders			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement rhun_attackers_5, Farest_Rhun, attack
            end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner North_Rhun = slave
                spawn_army
                    faction venice
                    character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 476, y 344, direction N, label rhun_attackers_6
                    traits		BadManRace 1, DaritaiClan 1, AIBoost 1, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, LogisticalSkill 1, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, TacticalSkill 1
                    unit		Loke Rim Bodyguard			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Khandish Raiders		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Khandish Raiders		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
                    unit		Khandish Hunters			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Khandish Hunters			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
                end
                console_command auto_win attacker
                siege_settlement rhun_attackers_6, North_Rhun, attack
            end_if
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    ;########################## Faction: Gundabad #########################
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
	    if not I_LocalFaction gundabad
		   set_event_counter snaga_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter moria_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter guldur_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter gate_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter mordor_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter isen_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter angmar_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter rhudaur_gundabad 1
		   set_event_counter uruk_gundabad 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if not I_LocalFaction gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner High_Pass = gundabad
	        and I_LocalFaction gundabad
			and I_EventCounter snaga_gundabad = 0
			historic_event snaga_gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
		if not I_LocalFaction gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter moria_gundabad = 0
			historic_event moria_gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor

		if not I_LocalFaction gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = gundabad
			and I_EventCounter moria_gundabad = 0
			historic_event moria_gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if			
	end_monitor

		if not I_LocalFaction gundabad
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		end_if			
	end_monitor

            and FactionType gundabad
		    and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction turks = AtWar
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
			and I_EventCounter rhudaur_gundabad = 0

			terminate_monitor			
	end_monitor

            and FactionType gundabad
		    and I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
			and I_EventCounter uruk_gundabad = 0
			and I_EventCounter gate_gundabad = 1
			and I_EventCounter mordor_gundabad = 1
			historic_event uruk_gundabad
			terminate_monitor			
	end_monitor

    ; United
    set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 0

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Central_Minhiriath = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner East_Cardolan = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Enedwaith = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Lond_Angren = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Minhiriath = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Pukel = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner South_Enedwaith = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Suduri = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Talsir = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Dunland_Hills = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Duneard = aztecs
        and I_SettlementOwner Dunland = aztecs
        if I_LocalFaction aztecs
            historic_event dunland_united
        end_if
        set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

	monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Kings_Land
		if not I_LocalFaction aztecs
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = aztecs
			historic_event rohan_kingship_reclaimed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Clan-moot
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_borders
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_count
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_failed
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_status
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_success
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_milan
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_normans
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_saxons
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_turks
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_aztecs
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_denmark
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_england
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_france
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_hre
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_milan
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_normans
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_poland
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_portugal
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_sicily
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_turks
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunedain
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_awaiting_answer
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_isengard_spy
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_economy
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_elves_decision
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_elves_warning
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_awaiting_answer
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_awaiting_answer
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_no_problems
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_money_shortage
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_overwar
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri
    declare_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_timer

    set_event_counter enedwaith_can_build_clanhall 0
    set_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction aztecs <= Neutral
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_aztecs 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction aztecs >= Hostile
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_aztecs 0
    end_monitor

        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark <= Neutral
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_denmark 1
    end_monitor

        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark >= Hostile

    end_monitor

    end_monitor

        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction turks >= Hostile
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_turks 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury <= 0
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_money_shortage 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury > 0
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_money_shortage 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            ; Variables
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute aztecs Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs 0
            end_if
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france 0
            end_if
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_milan 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute milan Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_milan 0
            end_if
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_normans 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute normans Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_normans 0
            end_if
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_saxons 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute saxons Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_saxons 0
            end_if
            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_turks 1
            if I_FactionLeaderAttribute turks Command < 999
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_turks 0
            end_if
            if I_TurnNumber = 1
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_initial
            end_if
            inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_timer = 4
                if I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
                    inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_count 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 1
                end_if
                if not I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_cant_convene
                end_if
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_timer 0
            end_if
            ; Old Events
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri >= 1
                and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri <= 3
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri = 3
                    if I_SettlementOwner Suduri = slave
                        if I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                            if I_CharacterExists enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                console_command move_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1, 507, 480
                                kill_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                campaign_wait 0.1
                            end_if
                            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_win
                        end_if
                        if not I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                            if I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_lost
                            end_if
                            if not I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                if I_CharacterExists enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                    console_command move_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1, 507, 480
                                    kill_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                    campaign_wait 0.1
                                end_if
                                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_lost_other
                            end_if
                        end_if
                    end_if
                    if not I_SettlementOwner Suduri = slave
                        if I_SettlementOwner Suduri = teutonic_order
                            if I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_half_slave
                            end_if
                            if not I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                if I_CharacterExists enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                    console_command move_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1, 507, 480
                                    kill_character enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                                    campaign_wait 0.1
                                end_if
                                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_half_other
                            end_if
                        end_if
                        if not I_SettlementOwner Suduri = teutonic_order
                            if I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_defeat_slave
                            end_if
                            if not I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = slave
                                if I_CharacterExists enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
