                            inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                        end_if
                        if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter >= 2
                            set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order -0.3
                            set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons -0.3
                            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_elves_warning
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_elves_warning 1
                            inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                        end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_overwar = 0
                    set_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_aztecs = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_denmark = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_england = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_france = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_hre = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_milan = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_normans = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_poland = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_portugal = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_sicily = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_turks = 0
                        inc_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                    end_if
                    if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter >= 5
                        set_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0
                        if I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                            provoke_rebellion Druwaith_Iaur
                            set_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                        end_if
                        if I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
                            provoke_rebellion North_Enedwaith
                            set_event_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 1
                        end_if
                        if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 1
                            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_overwar_rebellion
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_overwar 1
                            inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 2
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                            set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                        end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_normans = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 2
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_normans = 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner Suduri = slave
                    and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile teutonic_order named_character 5 126, 291
                    and RandomPercent <= 75
                    spawn_army
                        faction slave, sub_faction normans
                        character	random_name, named character, age 23, x 126, y 291, direction NE, label enedwaith_suduri_invaders_1
                        traits		MiddleManRace 1, AIBoost 1, Locked 1, Energetic 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
                        unit		Breeland Bodyguard			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Breeland Militia		exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Breeland Militia		exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Lumbermen		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Lumbermen		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Lumbermen		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Breeland Militia		exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Breeland Militia		exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Archer Militia		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Archer Militia		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Westron Catapult			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    end
                    generate_random_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0 1
                    if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 0
                        historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri_nowar
                    end_if
                    if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 1
                        console_command diplomatic_stance normans teutonic_order war
                        set_faction_standing normans teutonic_order -1.0
                        set_faction_standing teutonic_order normans -1.0
                        historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri
                        inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
                    end_if
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_suduri 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_isengard_spy = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 2
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_france = 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_awaiting_answer 1
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard true
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_economy = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 4
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_money_shortage = 1
                    and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner Lond_Angren = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner South_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
                    add_money teutonic_order 10000
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_economy
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_economy 1
                    inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_turks = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunedain = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 6
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_turks = 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
                    and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
                    and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile teutonic_order named_character 5 171, 312
                    and RandomPercent <= 50
                    spawn_army
                        faction turks
                        character	random_name, named character, age 28, x 171, y 312, direction SW, label enedwaith_dunedain_invaders_1
                        traits		DunedainRace 1, AIBoost 1, Locked 1, Energetic 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Loyal 2, LoyaltyStarter 1, NightBattleCapable 1, PietyStarter 1
                        unit		Dunedain Bodyguard			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Dunedain Blademasters		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Dunedain Wardens		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Dunedain Wardens		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                        unit		Dunedain Rangers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Dunedain Rangers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Westron Catapult			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                        unit		Westron Catapult			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    end
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunedain
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunedain 1
                    inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_no_problems = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 6
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_diplomacy_aztecs = 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dunland = aztecs
                    and RandomPercent <= 50
                    console_command add_population Talsir, -50
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_awaiting_answer 1
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid true
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 8
                    and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                    and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
                    and RandomPercent <= 10
                    console_command add_population Druwaith_Iaur, -200
                    console_command add_population North_Enedwaith, -400
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_awaiting_answer 1
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo true
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot = 1
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup = 0
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter >= 5
                    and I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_count >= 10
                    and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
                    and RandomPercent <= 5
                    provoke_rebellion Druwaith_Iaur
                    generate_random_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0 2
                    if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 0
                        console_command add_population Talsir, -20
                        historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_failed
                        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_failed 1
                    end_if
                    if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter > 0
                        console_command add_population Talsir, -400
                        historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_success
                        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_success 1
                    end_if
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred = 0
                    historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_empty
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 2
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred = 1
                    set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_something_occurred 0
                end_if
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_awaiting_answer 0
        if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france = 0
            generate_random_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0 1
            if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 0
                add_money teutonic_order 1000
                set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order 0.6
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs 0.6
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_chill_positive
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 1
                set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order -0.8
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs -0.8
                set_faction_standing france teutonic_order -0.8
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order france -0.8
                set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_isengard_spy 1
                inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_react_positive
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france = 0
            add_money teutonic_order 1000
            set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order 0.6
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs 0.6
            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_chill_positive
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_awaiting_answer 0
        generate_random_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter 0 1
        if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 0
            set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order -0.2
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs -0.2
            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_chill_negative
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_generic_counter = 1
            console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs teutonic_order war
            set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order -1.0
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs -1.0
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_france = 0
                set_faction_standing france teutonic_order -0.8
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order france -0.8
            end_if
            inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
            historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_react_negative
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_awaiting_answer 0
        add_money teutonic_order -3000
        console_command add_population North_Enedwaith, 130
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_awaiting_answer 0
        console_command add_population North_Enedwaith, 30
        inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_awaiting_answer 0
        add_money teutonic_order 15000
        console_command diplomatic_stance france teutonic_order allied
        set_faction_standing france teutonic_order 1.0
        set_faction_standing teutonic_order france 1.0
        if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs = 0
            set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order 0.6
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs 0.6
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_milan = 0
            console_command diplomatic_stance milan teutonic_order war
            set_faction_standing milan teutonic_order -1.0
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order milan -1.0
        end_if
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_no_problems 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_awaiting_answer 0
        set_faction_standing france teutonic_order -0.6
        set_faction_standing teutonic_order france -0.6
        if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dead_aztecs = 0
            set_faction_standing aztecs teutonic_order -0.4
            set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs -0.4
        end_if
        inc_counter enedwaith_clanmoot_coup_counter 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_dunland_raid true
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_gwathlo true
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event enedwaith_clanmoot_isengard true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; United
    set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 0

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Central_Minhiriath = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Druwaith_Iaur = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner East_Cardolan = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Lond_Angren = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Minhiriath = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner North_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Pukel = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner South_Enedwaith = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Suduri = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Talsir = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Dunland_Hills = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Duneard = teutonic_order
        and I_SettlementOwner Dunland = teutonic_order
        if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
            historic_event enedwaith_united
        end_if
        set_event_counter enedwaith_is_united 1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;######################### Faction: High Elves ##########################

    ; Eregion Reclaiming
    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement
        if I_LocalFaction saxons
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_SettlementOwner Eregion = saxons
            console_command add_population Imladris, -50
            console_command add_population Eregion, 50
            increment_kings_purse saxons 600
            add_events
                event historic	imladris_claim_eregion
                date		0
                position	214, 331
            end_add_events
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ; Glorfindel
    declare_counter glorfindel_spawned

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType saxons
        if I_NumberOfSettlements saxons >= 15
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Glorfindel, named character, age 22, x 245, y 379, direction S, portrait Glorfindel, battle_model glorfin, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label glorfindel_1
                traits		Glorfindel 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseGoldenFlower 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 3, Handsome 3, BattleOfFornost 1, FallOfGondolin 1, KilledBalrog 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Just 1, LivedAges 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, Reincarnated 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Elderinwe Roquen			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            set_counter glorfindel_spawned 1
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                snap_strat_camera 245, 379
                campaign_wait 1
                historic_event glorfindel
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal <= 2
            and I_CompareCounter glorfindel_spawned = 0
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Glorfindel, named character, age 22, x 245, y 379, direction S, portrait Glorfindel, battle_model glorfin, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label glorfindel_1
                traits		Glorfindel 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseGoldenFlower 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 3, Handsome 3, BattleOfFornost 1, FallOfGondolin 1, KilledBalrog 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 3, Just 1, LivedAges 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, Reincarnated 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Elderinwe Roquen			exp 6 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            set_counter glorfindel_spawned 1
            if I_LocalFaction saxons
                snap_strat_camera 245, 379
                campaign_wait 1
                historic_event glorfindel
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter glorfindel_spawned = 1
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 troops_helf
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 asfaloth
            console_command give_ancillary glorfindel_1 glorfindel_armour
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    ; Dornornoston
    declare_counter dornornoston_spawned

	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = m_gwaith_i_mirdain_guild
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Dornornoston, named character, age 22, x 214, y 335, direction S, portrait Galdor, battle_model eregion_smiths, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label dornornoston_1
                traits		Dornornoston 1, CustomBG 1, Hero 1, ElvenRace 1, Noldor 1, HouseFinarfin 1, HeroAbilityElf 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, Brave 2, Handsome 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 2, Just 1, Loyal 3, LoyaltyStarter 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Eregion Smiths			exp 2 armour 10 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            set_counter dornornoston_spawned 1
                snap_strat_camera 214, 335
                campaign_wait 1
				if I_LocalFaction saxons
                historic_event dornornoston
				end_if
            console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 elven_sculptor
            console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 eregion_helmet
            console_command give_ancillary dornornoston_1 noldor_shield
            terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    ; The Twins
	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal					
	    and FactionType saxons
	    and I_TurnNumber = 15	
	        point_at_strat_position 191, 380	
            snap_strat_camera 191, 380
            campaign_wait 1
		    historic_event the_twins_start
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
		
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType saxons	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 15	
	        if I_CharacterTypeNearTile saxons diplomat, 5 191, 380
		    ui_flash_stop
            zoom_strat_camera 203, 385
            campaign_wait 1
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Elladan, named character, age 18, x 223, y 386, portrait Elladan, battle_model twins_elladan, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label elladan_1
                unit		Dunedain Bodyguard 			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Dunedain Scouts 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction saxons
                character	Elrohir, named character, age 17, x 186, y 393, portrait Elrohir, battle_model twins_elrohir, hero_ability Light_of_the_Faith, label elrohir_1
                unit		Dunedain Bodyguard 			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Dunedain Scouts 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
            end	
		    historic_event the_twins
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor

    ; Elven Barracks rules
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if not I_LocalFaction saxons
		   set_event_counter imladris_controlled 1
		   set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if I_LocalFaction saxons
        and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
        set_event_counter imladris_controlled 1
		end_if
	    if I_LocalFaction saxons
        and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
        set_event_counter imladris_controlled 0
		end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if I_LocalFaction saxons
        and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
        set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 1
		end_if
	    if I_LocalFaction saxons
        and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
        set_event_counter mithlond_controlled 0
		end_if
    end_monitor


    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	    if not I_LocalFaction saxons
		   set_event_counter jewel_guild_rebuilt 1
		   set_event_counter eregion_reclaimed 1
		   terminate_monitor
        end_if	
	end_monitor
	
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		if not I_LocalFaction saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_SettlementOwner Eregion = saxons
			and I_EventCounter eregion_reclaimed = 0
			historic_event eregion_reclaimed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = m_gwaith_i_mirdain_guild
		if not I_LocalFaction saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_LocalFaction saxons
			and I_EventCounter jewel_guild_rebuilt = 0
			historic_event jewel_guild_rebuilt
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		if not I_LocalFaction saxons
			terminate_monitor
		end_if

		if I_TurnNumber = 0
		        destroy_buildings saxons teleri_barracks true
		        destroy_buildings saxons teleri_barracks_castle true
				campaign_wait 5
                console_command create_building Imladris c_teleri_barracks
                console_command create_building Mithlond teleri_barracks
			terminate_monitor
		end_if					
	end_monitor	
	
	;######################### Faction: Lorien ##########################
	;Rumil
	declare_counter rumil_spawned
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType ireland
	and I_TurnNumber >= 30
		if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = ireland
			spawn_army
				faction ireland
				character	Rumil, named character, age 20, x 269, y 329, direction S, portrait rumil, battle_model haldir, label rumil_1
				traits		Rumil 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
				unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
			end
			set_counter rumil_spawned 1
			if I_LocalFaction ireland
				snap_strat_camera 269, 329
				campaign_wait 1
				historic_event rumil_promoted
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter rumil_spawned = 1
			console_command give_ancillary rumil_1 galadhrim_sentinel
			console_command give_ancillary rumil_1 lorien_cloak
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;Orophin
	declare_counter orophin_spawned
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType ireland
	and I_TurnNumber >= 30
		if I_NumberOfSettlements ireland >= 8
			spawn_army
				faction ireland
				character	Orophin, named character, age 20, x 272, y 329, direction S, portrait orophin, battle_model haldir, label orophin_1
				traits		Orophin 1, ElvenRace 1, Nandor 1, HouseAmdir 1, BattleChivalryGood 1, Brave 1, GoodAttacker 1, GoodCommander 1, Loyal 2, Upright 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
				unit		Lothlorien Marchwardens			exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
			end
			set_counter orophin_spawned 1
			if I_LocalFaction ireland
				snap_strat_camera 272, 329
				campaign_wait 1
				historic_event orophin_promoted
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter orophin_spawned = 1
			console_command give_ancillary orophin_1 galadhrim_sentinel
			console_command give_ancillary orophin_1 lorien_bow
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	;####### Script: Rhun Dragon Relic  ################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_scales = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Esgaroth = venice
				historic_event smaug_scales
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists smaug_artefact
				historic_event smaug_scales
				historic_event smaug_jewels
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_jewels = 0
			and I_SettlementOwner Esgaroth = venice
				historic_event smaug_jewels
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter scatha_artefact = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Lower_Anduin_Vale = venice
				historic_event scatha_artefact
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists scatha_artefact
				historic_event scatha_artefact
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter dragon_egg = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Withered = venice
				historic_event dragon_egg
			end_if
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists egg_artefact
				historic_event dragon_egg
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter smaug_scales = 1
			and I_EventCounter smaug_jewels = 1
			and I_EventCounter scatha_artefact = 1
			and I_EventCounter dragon_egg = 1
			historic_event dragon_relic_complete
			console_command add_money 3000
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
        if not I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			and I_TurnNumber = 2
			disable_cursor
			hide_ui
			zoom_strat_camera 1
			campaign_wait 0.2
			snap_strat_camera 285, 380
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 288, 387
			point_at_settlement Lower_Anduin_Vale
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 338, 409
			point_at_settlement Esgaroth
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 315, 438
			point_at_settlement Withered
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			show_ui
			enable_cursor
			campaign_wait 0.2
            historic_event dragon_relic_hunt
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
    end_monitor

;######## Script: Reclaiming Dwarven Relics  #############
;check the final ered luin ring script for counters, turn numbers

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
			and I_EventCounter luin_ring_06 = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 0
			historic_event dwarven_relic_requisition_start
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

;narsil

	declare_counter narsil_claim_rejected
	set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 0

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter narsil_reclaimed = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
			and I_EventCounter narsil_aragorn_dead = 0
			snap_strat_camera 246, 384 ;Imladris
			historic_event narsil_aragorn_dead
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter narsil_aragorn_dead = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
			historic_event narsil_reclaimed
			console_command add_money 3000
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 38
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 0
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
				snap_strat_camera 200, 361
				campaign_wait 1
				move_strat_camera 217, 361
				campaign_wait 1
				point_at_settlement Angle
				campaign_wait 1
				ui_flash_stop
				historic_event dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 1
				and I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 0
				and I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
				and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
				snap_strat_camera 217, 361
				historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_a
				set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_narsil = 1
				and I_CompareCounter narsil_claim_rejected = 0
				if not I_SettlementOwner Angle = turks
					and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
					snap_strat_camera 217, 361
					historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_b
					set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
				if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narsil
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 4 218, 362
					snap_strat_camera 217, 361
					historic_event dwarves_demand_narsil_c
					set_counter narsil_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
			end_if
		end_if
    end_monitor

;horn of the mark

	declare_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected
	set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 0

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter eorls_horn_reclaimed = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 1
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
			and I_EventCounter eorls_horn_theoden_dead = 0
			snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
			historic_event eorls_horn_theoden_dead
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter eorls_horn_theoden_dead = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
			console_command add_money 3000
			historic_event eorls_horn_reclaimed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 46
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 0
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
				snap_strat_camera 240, 250 ;Edoras
				campaign_wait 1
				move_strat_camera 249, 250
				campaign_wait 1
				point_at_settlement Kings_Land
				campaign_wait 1
				ui_flash_stop
				historic_event dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 1
				and I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 0
				and I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = milan
				and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
				and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
				snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
				historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_a
				set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter dwarves_send_diplomat_eorls_horn = 1
				and I_CompareCounter eorls_horn_claim_rejected = 0
				if not I_SettlementOwner Kings_Land = milan
					and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
					snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
					historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_b
					set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
				if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists eorls_horn
					and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary diplomat, 5 248, 251 ;Edoras
					snap_strat_camera 249, 250 ;Edoras
					historic_event dwarves_demand_eorls_horn_c
					set_counter eorls_horn_claim_rejected 1
				end_if
			end_if
		end_if
    end_monitor

;Gurthang and Dragon-helm of Dor-lomin

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter luin_ring_rejected = 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 52
			and I_EventCounter luin_ring_accepted = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_relic_requisition_start = 1
			and I_EventCounter tol_morwen_start = 0
            snap_strat_camera 8, 449 ;Tol Fuin until Tol Morwen added
			campaign_wait 1
			move_strat_camera 8, 438
			campaign_wait 1
            point_at_strat_position 8, 438 ;Tol Morwen
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			historic_event tol_morwen_start
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter tol_morwen_start = 1
			and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hungary spy, 6 8, 438 ;Tol Morwen
			and I_EventCounter turins_grave_opened = 0
			historic_event turins_grave_opened
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter turins_grave_opened = 1
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists helm_dorlomin
			historic_event gurthang_reforged
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

;####### Script: Dwarven Grudges ##############################

	declare_counter dwarven_wmoria
	declare_counter dwarven_emoria
	declare_counter dwarven_gundabad
	declare_counter dwarven_dainshalls
	declare_counter dwarven_erebor


    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType moors
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber = 2
			disable_cursor
			hide_ui
			zoom_strat_camera 1
			campaign_wait 0.2
			snap_strat_camera 250, 342
			campaign_wait 1
			move_strat_camera 246, 342
			point_at_settlement East_Moria
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 242, 342
			point_at_settlement West_Moria
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 252, 439
			point_at_settlement Mt_Gundabad 
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 285, 439
			point_at_settlement Grey_Mountains
			campaign_wait 0.5
			move_strat_camera 339, 421
			point_at_settlement Erebor
			campaign_wait 1
			ui_flash_stop
			show_ui
			enable_cursor
			campaign_wait 0.2
			historic_event dwarven_realms_start
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_TurnNumber >= 20
			and I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
			historic_event dwarven_realms_start
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
		if not I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and not I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
			set_event_counter dwarven_realms_reclaimed 0
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 0
			set_event_counter dwarven_realms_reclaimed 1
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
        if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = moors
				set_counter dwarven_wmoria 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
				set_counter dwarven_emoria 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = norway
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = moors
				set_counter dwarven_gundabad 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = norway
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = moors
				set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 1
			end_if
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 0
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = norway
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = hungary
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
			if I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
				set_counter dwarven_erebor 1
			end_if
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
        if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Moria = moors
            set_counter dwarven_wmoria 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
            set_counter dwarven_emoria 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mt_Gundabad = moors
            set_counter dwarven_gundabad 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Grey_Mountains = moors
            set_counter dwarven_dainshalls 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = norway
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = hungary
            and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
            set_counter dwarven_erebor 0
		end_if
	end_monitor


    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionCultureType southern_european
		and FactionIsLocal
		and not FactionType hungary
		if I_CompareCounter dwarven_wmoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_emoria = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_gundabad = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_dainshalls = 1
			and I_CompareCounter dwarven_erebor = 1
			historic_event dwarven_realms_reclaimed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType moors
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
		and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
		console_command add_money 4000
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
		and not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
		and I_EventCounter dwarven_realms_reclaimed = 1
		console_command add_money 4000
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor


	;####### Script: Theoden ##############################

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			historic_event theoden_deceived
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			console_command give_trait theoden_1 TheodenDeceived 2
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			and I_TurnNumber >= 9
			console_command give_trait theoden_1 TheodenDeceived 2
			console_command character_reset theoden_1
			historic_event theoden_renewed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	;####### Script: Denethor ##############################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists high_warden
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 BoromirDead 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists warden
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 FaramirDead 1
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
        if I_TurnNumber >= 3
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter denethor_mad = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_mad = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 110 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 8
				historic_event denethor_mad
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 110
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 7
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 8
				historic_event denethor_mad
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_descending_madness = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 89 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 7
				historic_event denethor_descending_madness
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 89
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 6
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 7
				historic_event denethor_descending_madness
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sense_doom = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 69 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 6
				historic_event denethor_sense_doom
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 5
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 6
				historic_event denethor_sense_doom
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_progress = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 39 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 5
				historic_event denethor_sauron_progress
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 39
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 4
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 5
				historic_event denethor_sauron_progress
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_plan = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 29 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 4
				historic_event denethor_sauron_plan
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 29
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 3
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 4
				historic_event denethor_sauron_plan
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_defiance = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 19
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 3
				historic_event denethor_sauron_defiance
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 19
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 2
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 3
				historic_event denethor_sauron_defiance
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter denethor_sauron_contact = 0
            if I_TurnNumber < 10 
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 2
				historic_event denethor_sauron_contact
			end_if
			if I_TurnNumber = 10
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad = 1
				console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 2
				historic_event denethor_sauron_contact
			end_if
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 2
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 1
            historic_event denethor_palantir_start
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad > 0
			and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 1
			and I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 Sane 1
			console_command add_money 5000
			historic_event denethor_redeemed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_NumberOfSettlements england < 1
			and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily DenethorMad > 0
			and I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 DenethorMad 0
			console_command give_trait denethor_1 Sane 1
			console_command add_money 5000
			historic_event denethor_redeemed
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor

	declare_counter gondor_battle_lost

	monitor_event PostBattle FactionType sicily
		and not I_WonBattle sicily

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
			and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists anor_stone
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter denethor_redeemed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_CompareCounter gondor_battle_lost = 0
			set_counter gondor_battle_lost 1
			if I_CompareCounter gondor_battle_lost = 1
				and I_FactionLeaderTrait sicily GondorLostBattle = 0
            console_command give_trait denethor_1 GondorLostBattle 1
			end_if
		end_if
		set_counter gondor_battle_lost 0
	end_monitor
	
	
    ;############################ Aragorn RPG ############################

    if not I_LocalFaction turks
        set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -1
    end_if

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle <= -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 7
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	King_of_the_Dead, named character, age 40, x 208, y 483, portrait KingDead
                traits		LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Ents		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead KingDead 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead Hero 1
			console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead CustomBG 1
			console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead FearGeneral 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead HeroAbilityKingDead 1
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead BattleFear 5
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead GoodCommander 2
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead GoodAttacker 2
            console_command give_trait King_of_the_Dead Loyal 4
            create_unit King_of_the_Dead, Ents, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            send_character_off_map King_of_the_Dead
            destroy_units turks Ents
            spawn_army
                faction turks
                character	King_of_the_Dead, named character, x 251, y 247, battle_model oathbreakers2, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Dead
                unit		Oathbreakers	exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            historic_event aragorn_army_dead_middle
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 6
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_initial = 0
            historic_event aragorn_army_dead_initial
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 5
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_anduril = 0
            console_command remove_ancillary aragorn_1 narsil
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 anduril
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_anduril
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 4
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_back = 0
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_back
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 3
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_gollum = 0
            console_command give_ancillary aragorn_1 kingsfoil
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_gollum
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 2
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_rpg_letter = 0
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_letter
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 6
            ui_flash_stop
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber = 5
            snap_strat_camera 166, 380
            point_at_settlement Bree
            historic_event aragorn_rpg_start
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PostBattle FactionType turks
        if not I_LocalFaction turks
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 0
            and I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle = 0
            set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute oathbreakers_unit > 0
            inc_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle 1
            campaign_wait 0.1
        end_if
        if I_FactionLeaderTrait turks Aragorn = 0
            set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle 4
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle = 4
            set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -1
            if I_EventCounter is_the_ai = 0
                while I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle = -1
                    and I_EventCounter is_the_ai = 0
                end_while
                historic_event aragorn_army_dead_final
                destroy_units turks Oathbreakers
                if I_CharacterExists King_of_the_Dead
                    kill_character King_of_the_Dead
                end_if
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            while I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle = -1
                and I_EventCounter is_the_ai = 1
            end_while
            historic_event aragorn_army_dead_final
            destroy_units turks Oathbreakers
            if I_CharacterExists King_of_the_Dead
                kill_character King_of_the_Dead
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle < 0
        set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -2
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event SettlementSelected I_EventCounter aragorn_army_dead_middle < 0
        set_event_counter aragorn_army_dead_middle -2
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	    and I_LocalFaction turks
        if I_NumberOfSettlements portugal = 0
                historic_event rhudaur_dunedain
			 terminate_monitor
		end_if	 
    end_monitor

    ;###################### Script: Barrow Downs #########################

    declare_counter crypts_set
    declare_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Cardolan
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hre
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = portugal
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = france
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = poland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = england
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
            if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
                and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good = 0
                kill_character Barrow-wight
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = slave
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 0
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = sicily
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction sicily
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = denmark
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction denmark
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = milan
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction milan
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = normans
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction normans
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction turks
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = scotland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction scotland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if

                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if

        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = byzantium

            if I_LocalFaction byzantium
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = moors
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction moors
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = hungary
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction hungary
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = norway
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1

            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = saxons

                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = ireland
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction ireland
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = mongols
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction mongols
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = teutonic_order
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = venice
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction venice
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = aztecs
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction aztecs
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = spain
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction spain
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = russia
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction russia
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = khand
            set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 1
            if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 2
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
        and I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good > 0
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 490, y 12
                    traits	ScriptedBesieger 2
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	TemporarySpotter, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if I_LocalFaction england
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction sicily
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction denmark
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction milan
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction normans
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction turks
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts scotland false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts timurids false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts byzantium false

                end_if

                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts teutonic_order false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction venice
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts venice false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction poland
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts poland false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts hre false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction portugal
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts portugal false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction spain
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts spain false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction gundabad
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts gundabad false
                end_if				
                if I_LocalFaction russia
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts russia false
                end_if
                if I_LocalFaction khand
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts khand false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                move TemporarySpotter, 490, 11
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
                destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
                set_counter crypts_set 0
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set > 0
            replenish_units Barrow-wight
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 2
                and I_SettlementUnderSiege Cardolan
                and I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 2, 166, 372
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	TemporarySpotter, named character,  age 25, x 490, y 10
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = sicily
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts sicily false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = denmark
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts denmark false
                end_if
                if I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = milan
                    give_everything_to_faction scripts milan false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts normans false
                end_if

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts turks false

                    give_everything_to_faction scripts aztecs false
                end_if
                console_command mp TemporarySpotter -1
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 165, 371
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 371
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if

                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 165, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 372
                end_if

                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 166, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 165, 373
                end_if
                if I_CharacterTypeNearTile slave, named_character, 0, 167, 373
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 167, 373
                    move TemporarySpotter, 166, 373
                end_if
                reposition_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                kill_character TemporarySpotter
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    create_unit Barrow-wight, Snaga Catapult, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                    siege_settlement Barrow-wight, Cardolan, attack
                end_if
                set_counter sieges_testing 0
            end_if
            set_counter crypts_set 1
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter crypts_set = 0
            and RandomPercent <= 20
            inc_counter crypts_spawns 1
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 1
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_1
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_1
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_1, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 2
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_2
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_2
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_2, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 3
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_3
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_3
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_3, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 4
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_4
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false

                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_4, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 5
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_5
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_5
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_5, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 6
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_6
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_6
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_6, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 7
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_7
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
