            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_spawns = 10
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Barrow-wight, named character, age 33, x 490, y 10, portrait wight, label barrow_wight_10
                    traits	AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodAmbusher 2, GoodSiegeAttacker 2, Loyal 4
                    unit		Territorial Guardsmen	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts slave false
                console_command give_ancillary Barrow-wight wight
                send_character_off_map barrow_wight_10
                spawn_army
                    faction slave
                    character	barrow_wight_10, named character, x 162, y 374, direction SE, battle_model barrow_wight_king
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Rebel Barrow Wights	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            set_counter crypts_set 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                create_unit Barrow-wight, Rebel Barrow Wights, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                if not I_SettlementUnderSiege Cardolan
                    and RandomPercent >= 60
                    create_unit Barrow-wight, Rebel Barrow Wights, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
                    siege_settlement Barrow-wight, Cardolan, maintain
                    set_counter crypts_set 2
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter crypts_cardolan_owner_good = 2
                historic_event spawned_crypts
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementBuildingFinished = restored_crypts
        historic_event restored_crypts
        change_settlement_name Cardolan Gorthad
        set_counter crypts_cardolan_owner_good 10
        set_counter crypts_spawns 10
        destroy_units slave barrowwights_unit
        if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists wight
            kill_character Barrow-wight
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType barrow
        and I_EventCounter restored_crypts = 1
        console_command remove_ancillary this barrow
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists barrow
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor


    ;################ Script: Buildings & Settlements ####################

    ;##### Capital Change Cost

    monitor_event FactionNewCapital FactionIsLocal
        console_command add_money -150
        historic_event capital_change
    end_monitor

    ;##### Mithril Mines

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName East_Moria
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = m_mines
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            and I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = hungary
            increment_kings_purse hungary 250
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction moors
            and I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = moors
            increment_kings_purse moors 250
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild
        end_if
        if I_LocalFaction norway
            and I_SettlementOwner East_Moria = norway
            increment_kings_purse norway 500
            historic_event mithril_mines_rebuild
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Osgiliath, Tharbad, Fornost & Annuminas

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName East_Osgiliath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event osgiliath_east_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName West_Osgiliath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = citadel
        historic_event osgiliath_west_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Tharbad
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event tharbad_east_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Arthedain
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = fortress
		change_settlement_name Arthedain Fornost
        historic_event fornost_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Lake_Evendim
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
        historic_event annuminas_rebuild
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor	
	
    ;##################### Script: Corsair Invasions #####################
    ;##### Random and Mithlond spawns

    declare_counter umbar_ai_naval_reinf
    set_event_counter umbar_invade_mithlond -1

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType russia
        and not FactionIsLocal
        inc_counter umbar_ai_naval_reinf 1
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_ai_naval_reinf >= 12
            and RandomPercent > 50
            spawn_army
                faction russia
                character random_name, admiral,  age 25, x 240, y 80
                unit		Adunaim Boat		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0	
                unit		Adunaim Boat		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0					
            end
            set_counter umbar_ai_naval_reinf 0
        end_if
        if I_TurnNumber >= 80
            and I_EventCounter umbar_fleet_mithlond = 0
            and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = russia
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = aztecs
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = england
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = france
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = hre
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = khand
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = poland
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = portugal
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = russia
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = spain
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = venice
            and RandomPercent <= 10
            historic_event umbar_fleet_mithlond
            generate_random_counter umbar_invade_mithlond 4 8
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter umbar_invade_mithlond > 0
            inc_event_counter umbar_invade_mithlond -1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter umbar_invade_mithlond = 0
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = aztecs
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = england
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = france
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = hre
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = khand
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = poland
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = portugal
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = russia
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = spain
            and not I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = venice
            set_event_counter umbar_invade_mithlond -1
            spawn_army
                faction russia
                character		random_name, admiral, age 37, x 78, y 379, direction E
                traits			NumenoreanRace 1, FamousPirate 2, Sailor 5, CheckAdmiral 1
                unit		 	Adunaim Boat				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		 	Adunaim Boat				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction russia
                character		random_name, admiral, age 39, x 59, y 370, direction SE
                traits			NumenoreanRace 1, FamousPirate 1, Sailor 4, CheckAdmiral 1
                unit		 	Adunaim Boat				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		 	Adunaim Boat				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction russia
                character		random_name, named character, age 31, x 80, y 381, portrait Corsair, direction NE, label umbar_spawn_mithlond_1
                traits			NumenoreanRace 1, AIBoost 1, BattleChivalryEvil 2, BattleScarred 1, GoodAmbusher 1, GoodAttacker 2, GoodCommander 2, GoodDefender 1, Loyal 4, NightBattleCapable 1, StrategyChivalryEvil 1, TacticalSkill 1, ScriptedBesieger 3
                unit 			Naru n'Aru Household Guard				exp 8 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit 			Naru n'Aru Royal Guard			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0	
                unit			Adunaim Armsmen			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Adunaim Armsmen			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0				
                unit 			Abrazanim Nardubawib			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Abrazanim Nardubawib			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Abrazanim Nardutarik			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                unit			Abrazanim Nardutarik			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1				
                unit			Rozadan Footmen			exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit			Rozadan Footmen			exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit			Rozadan Footmen			exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1					
                unit 			Azrazair Marines					exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit			Azrazair Marines					exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1				
                unit			Azrazair Warriors		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Azrazair Warriors		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Azrazair Archers			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Azrazair Archers			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Westron Catapult			exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit			Westron Catapult			exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            siege_settlement umbar_spawn_mithlond_1, Mithlond, attack
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement SettlementName Mithlond
        and Trait ScriptedBesieger = 3
        reveal_tile 81, 382
        snap_strat_camera 81, 382
        historic_event corsair_take_mithlond
        hide_all_revealed_tiles
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;##### Coast

    declare_counter umbar_invasions_delay
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Edhellond
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Anfalas
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Methrast
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_WestLebennin
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Andrast
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_AndrastCape
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Fanuilond
    declare_counter umbar_invasion_Lebennin

    if not I_LocalFaction denmark
	     and not I_LocalFaction sicily
        set_counter umbar_invasions_count -1
    end_if
    set_event_counter corsair_take_tolfalas 1

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement CharFactionType russia
        and Trait ScriptedBesieger = 3
        and not SettlementName Mithlond
        ;and not SettlementIsLocal
        if not I_LocalFaction denmark
            and not I_LocalFaction sicily
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_tolfalas 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_amroth 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_edhellond 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_londgalen 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Methrast = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_methrast 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_linhir 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Andrast = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_annulond 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Andrast_Cape = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_tharagrondost 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Straits = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_nindad 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_barad 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_fanuilond 0
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = russia
            set_event_counter corsair_take_pelargir 0
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_tolfalas = 0
            reveal_tile 270, 163
            snap_strat_camera 270, 163
            historic_event corsair_take_tolfalas
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_amroth = 0
            reveal_tile 243, 189
            snap_strat_camera 243, 189
            historic_event corsair_take_amroth
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_amroth = 0
            reveal_tile 251, 202
            snap_strat_camera 251, 202
            historic_event corsair_take_edhellond
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_londgalen = 0
            reveal_tile 216, 202
            snap_strat_camera 216, 202
            historic_event corsair_take_londgalen
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Methrast = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_methrast = 0
            reveal_tile 254, 169
            snap_strat_camera 254, 169
            historic_event corsair_take_methrast
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_linhir = 0
            reveal_tile 283, 188
            snap_strat_camera 283, 188
            historic_event corsair_take_linhir
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_annulond = 0
            reveal_tile 176, 200
            snap_strat_camera 176, 200
            historic_event corsair_take_annulond
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast_Cape = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_annulond = 0
            reveal_tile 155, 192
            snap_strat_camera 155, 192
            historic_event corsair_take_tharagrondost
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Straits = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_nindad = 0
            reveal_tile 306, 170
            snap_strat_camera 306, 170
            historic_event corsair_take_nindad
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_barad = 0
            reveal_tile 278, 156
            snap_strat_camera 278, 156
            historic_event corsair_take_barad
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_fanuilond = 0
            reveal_tile 291, 182
            snap_strat_camera 291, 182
            historic_event corsair_take_Fanuilond
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = russia
            and I_EventCounter corsair_take_pelargir = 0
            reveal_tile 314, 184
            snap_strat_camera 314, 184
            historic_event corsair_take_pelargir
        end_if
        hide_all_revealed_tiles
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType russia
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay = 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = russia
        and not I_CrusadeInProgress
        if I_LocalFaction russia
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Andrast_Cape = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Straits = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Methrast = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Andrast = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = slave
            and not I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = slave
            if not I_LocalFaction denmark
                and not I_LocalFaction sicily
                set_counter umbar_invasions_count -1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = slave
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Tolfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 10
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = slave
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
            and I_TurnNumber >= 6
            and RandomPercent <= 5
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = slave
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Edhellond
            and I_TurnNumber >= 10
            and RandomPercent <= 5
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Edhellond 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Edhellond 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Anfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Anfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Anfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Methrast = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Methrast
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Methrast 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Methrast 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege West_Lebennin
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_WestLebennin 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_WestLebennin 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Andrast
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Andrast 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Andrast 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast_Cape = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Andrast_Cape
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_AndrastCape 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_AndrastCape 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Fanuilond
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Fanuilond 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Fanuilond 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = slave
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Lebennin
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Lebennin 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Lebennin 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType russia
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction denmark = AtWar
        and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay = 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = russia
        and not I_CrusadeInProgress
        if I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Tolfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 10
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 5
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Edhellond
            and RandomPercent <= 5
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Edhellond 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Edhellond 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Anfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Anfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Anfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Methrast = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Methrast
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Methrast 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Methrast 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege West_Lebennin
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_WestLebennin 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_WestLebennin 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Andrast
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Andrast 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Andrast 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast_Cape = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Andrast_Cape
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_AndrastCape 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_AndrastCape 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Fanuilond
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Fanuilond 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Fanuilond 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = denmark
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count <= 2
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Lebennin
            and RandomPercent <= 2
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Lebennin 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Lebennin 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter corsairs_off_coast = 1
            if I_LocalFaction Denmark
                historic_event corsairs_off_coast
                set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 0
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType russia
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily = AtWar
        and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay = 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = russia
        and not I_CrusadeInProgress
        if I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = sicily
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Tolfalas
            and RandomPercent <= 10
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 2
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count 1
            set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 1
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = sicily
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25
            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
            and I_TurnNumber >= 6
            and RandomPercent <= 5
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 1
            if RandomPercent <= 50
                set_counter umbar_invasion_Belfalas 2

        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Andrast = sicily
            and I_TurnNumber >= 25

            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Andrast
            and RandomPercent <= 2

            and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Lebennin
            and RandomPercent <= 2

            if I_LocalFaction Sicily
                historic_event corsairs_off_coast
                set_event_counter corsairs_off_coast 0
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType russia
        and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count != 0
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas > 0
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	CorsairInvaderTolfalas, named character, age 31, x 270, y 164, portrait Corsair
                traits	NumenoreanRace 1, ScriptedBesieger 3, AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodSiegeAttacker 1, Locked 1
                unit 		Naru n'Aru Household Guard				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit 		Azrazair Warriors		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Azrazair Crossbowmen		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Azrazair Crossbowmen		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Azrazair Crossbowmen		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Abrazanim Nardutarik			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Westron Catapult			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	CorsairShipTolfalas, admiral, age 42, x 267, y 159
                unit		Corsair Ship Script			exp 8 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            console_command give_trait CorsairShipTolfalas Locked 1
            give_everything_to_faction scripts russia false
            console_command mp CorsairShipTolfalas -1
            if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas = 2
                create_unit CorsairInvaderTolfalas, Azrazair Raiders, num 1, exp 2, arm 1, wep 0
                create_unit CorsairInvaderTolfalas, Azrazair Archers, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 1
            end_if
            siege_settlement CorsairInvaderTolfalas, Tolfalas, maintain
            if I_SettlementUnderSiege Tolfalas
                console_command give_trait CorsairInvaderTolfalas ScriptedBesieger 4
            end_if
            inc_counter umbar_invasions_count -1
            if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count = 0
                set_counter umbar_invasions_count -2
                set_counter umbar_invasions_delay 8
            end_if
            set_counter umbar_invasion_Tolfalas 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay = 0
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_count > 0
            set_counter umbar_invasions_delay 8
            if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasion_Belfalas > 0
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	CorsairInvaderBelfalas, named character, age 32, x 243, y 190, portrait Corsair
                    traits	NumenoreanRace 1, ScriptedBesieger 3, AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodSiegeAttacker 1, Locked 1
                    unit 		Naru n'Aru Household Guard				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit 		Abrazanim Nardutarik			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	CorsairShipBelfalas, admiral, age 38, x 242, y 187
                    unit		Corsair Ship Script			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_trait CorsairShipBelfalas Locked 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasion_Edhellond > 0
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	CorsairInvaderEdhellond, named character, age 33, x 251, y 202, portrait Corsair
                    traits	NumenoreanRace 1, ScriptedBesieger 3, AIBoost 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodSiegeAttacker 1, Locked 1
                    unit 		Naru n'Aru Household Guard				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit 		Abrazanim Nardutarik			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Raiders			exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                    unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                    unit		Azrazair Archers			exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end
                spawn_army

                    character	CorsairShipEdhellond, admiral, age 37, x 249, y 201, direction NE

                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 305, 171
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 305, 171
                        move TemporarySpotter, 305, 170
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 306, 171
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 306, 171
                        move TemporarySpotter, 305, 171
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 307, 171
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 307, 171
                        move TemporarySpotter, 307, 170
                    end_if
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                end_if
                console_command give_trait CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits ScriptedBesieger 3
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    if I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Straits = slave
                        console_command auto_win attacker
                    end_if
                    siege_settlement CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits, Anduin_Straits, attack
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits -1
                    set_counter sieges_testing 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderBaradHarn
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Barad_Harn
                    and I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 2, 278, 156
                    and not I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = russia
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 277, 155
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 277, 155
                        move TemporarySpotter, 278, 155
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 278, 155
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 278, 155
                        move TemporarySpotter, 277, 155
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 279, 155
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 279, 155
                        move TemporarySpotter, 278, 155
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 277, 156
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 277, 156
                        move TemporarySpotter, 277, 155
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 279, 156
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 279, 156
                        move TemporarySpotter, 279, 155
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 277, 157
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 277, 157
                        move TemporarySpotter, 277, 156
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 278, 157
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 278, 157
                        move TemporarySpotter, 277, 157
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 279, 157
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 279, 157
                        move TemporarySpotter, 278, 157
                    end_if
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                end_if
                console_command give_trait CorsairInvaderBaradHarn ScriptedBesieger 3
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    if I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = slave
                        console_command auto_win attacker
                    end_if
                    siege_settlement CorsairInvaderBaradHarn, Barad_Harn, attack
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderBaradHarn -1
                    set_counter sieges_testing 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderFanuilond
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Fanuilond
                    and I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 2, 291, 182
                    and not I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = russia
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 290, 181
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 290, 181
                        move TemporarySpotter, 291, 181
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 291, 181
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 291, 181
                        move TemporarySpotter, 290, 181
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 292, 181
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 292, 181
                        move TemporarySpotter, 291, 181
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 290, 182
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 290, 182
                        move TemporarySpotter, 290, 181
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 292, 182
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 292, 182
                        move TemporarySpotter, 292, 181
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 290, 183
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 290, 183
                        move TemporarySpotter, 290, 182
                    end_if
                    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 291, 183
                        console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 291, 183
                        move TemporarySpotter, 290, 183
                    end_if
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                end_if
                console_command give_trait CorsairInvaderFanuilond ScriptedBesieger 3
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    if I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = slave
                        console_command auto_win attacker
                    end_if
                    siege_settlement CorsairInvaderFanuilond, Fanuilond, attack
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderFanuilond -1
                    set_counter sieges_testing 0
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderLebennin
                set_counter sieges_testing 1
                if I_SettlementUnderSiege Lebennin
                    and I_CharacterTypeNearTile russia, named_character, 0, 315, 184
                    and not I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = russia
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter 315, 184
                    move TemporarySpotter, 316, 184
                    console_command move_character TemporarySpotter, 490, 10
                end_if
                console_command give_trait CorsairInvaderLebennin ScriptedBesieger 3
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 0
                    if I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = slave
                        console_command auto_win attacker
                    end_if
                    siege_settlement CorsairInvaderLebennin, Lebennin, attack
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter sieges_testing = 1
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderLebennin -1
                    set_counter sieges_testing 0
                end_if
            end_if
            kill_character TemporarySpotter
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay <= 6
            and I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay > 1
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderTolfalas
                if not I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderTolfalas -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderTolfalas
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderBelfalas
                if not I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderBelfalas -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderBelfalas
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderEdhellond
                if not I_SettlementOwner Edhellond = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderEdhellond -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderEdhellond
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAnfalas

                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress

                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderMethrast

                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderMethrast -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress

                end_if
            end_if

                if I_CrusadeInProgress

                end_if

            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAndrastCape

                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderAndrastCape -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress

                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits
                if not I_SettlementOwner Anduin_Straits = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderBaradHarn
                if not I_SettlementOwner Barad_Harn = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderBaradHarn -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderBaradHarn
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderFanuilond
                if not I_SettlementOwner Fanuilond = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderFanuilond -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderFanuilond
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderLebennin
                if not I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = russia
                    console_command mp CorsairInvaderLebennin -1
                end_if
                if I_CrusadeInProgress
                    kill_character CorsairInvaderLebennin
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter umbar_invasions_delay = 1
            set_counter umbar_invasions_count 0
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderTolfalas
                kill_character CorsairInvaderTolfalas
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderBelfalas
                kill_character CorsairInvaderBelfalas
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderEdhellond
                kill_character CorsairInvaderEdhellond
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAnfalas
                kill_character CorsairInvaderAnfalas
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderMethrast
                kill_character CorsairInvaderMethrast
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderWestLebennin
                kill_character CorsairInvaderWestLebennin
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAndrast
                kill_character CorsairInvaderAndrast
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAndrastCape
                kill_character CorsairInvaderAndrastCape
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits
                kill_character CorsairInvaderAnduinStraits
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderBaradHarn
                kill_character CorsairInvaderBaradHarn
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderFanuilond
                kill_character CorsairInvaderFanuilond
            end_if
            if I_CharacterExists CorsairInvaderLebennin
                kill_character CorsairInvaderLebennin
            end_if
        end_if
        inc_counter umbar_invasions_delay -1
    end_monitor

    ;#################### Script: Dorwinion Choice #######################
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            historic_event dorwinion_choice
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    declare_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer

    set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 0
    set_event_counter dorwinion_men 0

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        and I_TurnNumber >= 53
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            if I_TurnNumber = 53
                set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 1
                historic_event dorwinion_influence_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction byzantium
            and I_TurnNumber = 58
            increment_kings_purse byzantium 300
            generate_random_counter dorwinion_ai_choice 1 2
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_ai_choice = 1
                set_event_counter dorwinion_men 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, direction E, portrait Reginard
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	    end
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_ai_choice = 2
                set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Avari Naharim			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType dorwinion_influence_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter dorwinion_men 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, direction E, portrait Reginard
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_men
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType dorwinion_influence_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
        set_counter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter dorwinion_elf 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Avari Naharim			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_choose_elves
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
        and I_TurnNumber = 71
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_men = 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Avlyn, named character, age 27, x 438, y 339, direction E, portrait Dornornoston, battle_model avari_general
             	    traits		Avlyn 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Avari 1, HouseAvlyn 1, WarCouncillor 1, Handsome 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Avari Naharim			exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Shadows			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Protectors			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Moriquendi Sentinels 			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Spearmen			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Avari Warriors			exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_elven_support
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter dorwinion_elf = 1
			  	spawn_army
                	faction byzantium
               	    character	Edwodyn, named character, age 27, x 410, y 328, direction E, portrait Reginard, battle_model merc_general
             	    traits		Edwodyn 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Paladins			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             	    unit		Dorwinion Armsmen			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Vintner-Court Knights			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
             	    unit		Regent Bowguard			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1

             	    unit		Regent Spearguard			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
           	    end
                historic_event dorwinion_human_support
            end_if
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction byzantium
            if I_CompareCounter dorwinion_influence_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event dorwinion_influence_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction byzantium
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	;#################### Script: Bree Choice ############################
	
	declare_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer
	declare_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer
	declare_counter bree_war
	
    set_event_counter bree_military 0
    set_event_counter bree_mercenary 0
	set_counter bree_war 0
	
	if I_LocalFaction normans
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
	end_if
	
	if not I_LocalFaction normans
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
	end_if
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType normans
		
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
		
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType normans
		
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 1
		
		if I_EventCounter bree_mercenary = 1
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
			set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter bree_military = 1
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
			set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		end_if
				
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType normans
        and I_TurnNumber >= 65
		if I_LocalFaction normans
			and I_TurnNumber = 65
			historic_event bree_choice_warning
        end_if
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType normans
        and FactionIsLocal
        and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction turks = AtWar
		
        set_counter bree_war 1
		terminate_monitor
		
    end_monitor
		
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType normans
        and I_TurnNumber >= 66
		
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 0
				and I_NumberOfSettlements turks > 0
                set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 1
                historic_event bree_influence_choice true
				terminate_monitor
            end_if
			
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 1
				
				set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1
				
				set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
				set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
				set_event_counter bree_allied 0
				
				kill_character brathor1
				destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
				destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
				destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
				
				increment_kings_purse normans 1500
				historic_event bree_warmonger
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
			
			if I_TurnNumber = 69
				and I_CompareCounter bree_war = 0
				and I_NumberOfSettlements turks = 0
				set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 1
                historic_event bree_refugees_choice true
				terminate_monitor
			end_if
			
        end_if
		
        if not I_LocalFaction normans
			set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1
			
			set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
			set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
			set_event_counter bree_allied 0
			
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_refugees_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_military 1	;Bree Dunedain path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		
		increment_kings_purse normans -500
		
		historic_event bree_refugees_accepted
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_refugees_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1	;Bree mercenary path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		
		kill_character brathor1
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
		destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
		
		increment_kings_purse normans 1500
		
		historic_event bree_refugees_declined
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_influence_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_military 1	;Bree Dunedain path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 0
		set_event_counter bree_allied 1
		
		set_faction_standing normans turks 1
        set_faction_standing turks normans 1
		
		increment_kings_purse normans -500
		
		historic_event bree_choice_accepted
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType bree_influence_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter bree_influence_awaiting_answer 0
        set_event_counter bree_mercenary 1	;Bree mercenary path counter
		
		set_event_counter bree_neutral 0
		set_event_counter bree_isolated 1
		set_event_counter bree_allied 0
		
		kill_character brathor1
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Wardens
		destroy_units normans Dunedain Rangers
		destroy_buildings normans dunedain_camp false
		
		console_command diplomatic_stance normans turks neutral
		set_faction_standing normans turks -0.2
        set_faction_standing turks normans -0.2
		
		increment_kings_purse normans 1500
		
		historic_event bree_choice_declined
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart I_TurnNumber = 70
        if I_EventCounter bree_mercenary = 1
			spawn_army
                faction normans
                character	Reginard, named character, age 27, x 161, y 382, direction E, portrait Reginard, battle_model merc_general
                traits		Reginard 1, CustomBG 1, GoodManRace 1, Dorwinrim 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Sellswords			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
                unit		Sellswords			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end
			if I_LocalFaction normans
				historic_event bree_mercenary_general
			end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_EventCounter bree_military = 1
			spawn_army
                faction normans
                character	Aldaron, named character, age 27, x 119, y 377, direction E, portrait Aldaron, battle_model high_elves_general_dac
                traits		Aldaron 1, CustomBG 1, ElvenRace 1, Lindar 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1
                unit		Calaquendi Lords			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end
			if I_LocalFaction normans
				historic_event bree_elven_general
			end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            if I_CompareCounter bree_influence_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event bree_influence_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction normans
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction normans
            if I_CompareCounter bree_refugees_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event bree_refugees_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction normans
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	;################## Script: Ered Luin Ring Choice ###################
		
 	; Event Counter Setup 
	declare_counter luin_ring_awaiting_answer
 	
	; Luin Ring Offer Prelude
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber >= 14
		if I_LocalFaction hungary
			and I_TurnNumber = 14
			historic_event luin_ring_01
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Offer (Ered Luin, Mordor, Other Factions)
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber >= 29
		if I_LocalFaction hungary
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
			historic_event luin_ring_02
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if I_LocalFaction england
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
			historic_event luin_ring_mordor
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
		if not I_LocalFaction hungary
		    and not I_LocalFaction england
			and I_TurnNumber = 29
		    historic_event luin_ring_ai
		    terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
	; Luin Ring Offer Elven Warning
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber = 31
		if I_LocalFaction hungary
			historic_event luin_ring_03
			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor
	
    ; Luin Ring Choice
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
        and I_TurnNumber = 33
        if I_LocalFaction hungary
            set_counter luin_ring_awaiting_answer 1
            historic_event luin_ring_04 true 
		    terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction hungary
            generate_random_counter ered_luin_ai_choice 1 2
            if I_EventCounter ered_luin_ai_choice = 1
                set_event_counter luin_ring_accepted 1
                set_event_counter AI_luin_ring_accepted 1
			    historic_event luin_ring_15
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary gundabad Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary portugal Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary norway Neutral
		        console_command diplomatic_stance hungary timurids Neutral

		        set_faction_standing moors hungary -1

		        set_faction_standing hungary norway -1
		        set_faction_standing norway hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing normans hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary normans -1

		        set_faction_standing saxons hungary -1
		        set_faction_standing hungary portugal 0.5
		        set_faction_standing portugal hungary 0.5
			    spawn_army
                    faction hungary
                    character	Grindfarn, named character, age 27, x 76, y 437, direction E, portrait Grindfarn, label grindfarn_2
                    traits		Grindfarn 1, DwarvenRace 1, Grimborn 1, NaturalMilitarySkill 1, GoodCommander 1, GoodDefender 3, SiegeDefender 1, Loyal 1, LoyaltyStarter 1, PietyStarter 1, BattleChivalryGood 2, StrategyChivalryGood 1, Energetic 2

				    unit		Grimborn Reavers			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
                end

			    console_command give_ancillary grindfarn_2 dwarven_power_ring2
			    console_command give_ancillary grindfarn_2 dwarven_power_ring
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter ered_luin_ai_choice = 2
                set_event_counter luin_ring_rejected 1
                set_event_counter AI_luin_ring_rejected 1
			    historic_event luin_ring_16
			    set_faction_standing hungary england -1
			    set_faction_standing england hungary -1
			    set_faction_standing hungary saxons 1
			    set_faction_standing saxons hungary 1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

        and FactionIsLocal

		if I_LocalFaction hungary

			terminate_monitor
        end_if
	end_monitor

                end_if

			        spawn_army
                    faction norway
                    character	Dwalin, named character, age 27, x 90, y 455, portrait Dwalin, direction W, label KD_retribution_4
