                    set_counter Saruman_ring_choice_awaiting_answer 1
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 2
            if not I_LocalFaction France
                point_at_settlement Udun
                snap_strat_camera 346, 250
                historic_event ring_deliver
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction France
                if not I_CharacterExists saruman_1
                    point_at_settlement Udun
                    snap_strat_camera 346, 250
                    historic_event ring_deliver
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists saruman_1
                    if I_EventCounter Saruman_ring_choice_accepted = 1
                        point_at_settlement Udun
                        snap_strat_camera 346, 250
                        historic_event ring_deliver
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if

        ;### Ring failure (evil)
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession > 2
            if I_CompareCounter barad_foreign = 1
                and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                set_counter barad_foreign 0
                set_counter ring_possession 2
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter morannon_foreign = 1
                and I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
                set_counter morannon_foreign 0
                set_counter ring_possession 2
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
                set_counter barad_foreign 1
            end_if
            if not I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
                set_counter morannon_foreign 1
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 27
            ui_flash_stop
            set_event_counter ring_deliver 0
            set_counter endRing 1
            historic_event ring_failed_evil
            console_command message_collation_set on
            if I_LocalFaction france
                set_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard -1
                set_event_counter saruman_ring_event -1
                set_faction_standing france england -1
                set_faction_standing france spain -1
                set_faction_standing france venice -1
                set_faction_standing france hre -1
                set_faction_standing france portugal -1
                set_faction_standing france aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing france poland -1
                set_faction_standing france russia -1
                set_faction_standing france khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance france england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance france papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance france khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction spain
                set_faction_standing spain england -1
                set_faction_standing spain france -1
                set_faction_standing spain venice -1
                set_faction_standing spain hre -1
                set_faction_standing spain portugal -1
                set_faction_standing spain aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing spain poland -1
                set_faction_standing spain russia -1
                set_faction_standing spain khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction venice
                set_faction_standing venice england -1
                set_faction_standing venice france -1
                set_faction_standing venice spain -1
                set_faction_standing venice hre -1
                set_faction_standing venice portugal -1
                set_faction_standing venice aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing venice poland -1
                set_faction_standing venice russia -1
                set_faction_standing venice khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance venice papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hre
                set_faction_standing hre england -1
                set_faction_standing hre france -1
                set_faction_standing hre spain -1
                set_faction_standing hre venice -1
                set_faction_standing hre portugal -1
                set_faction_standing hre aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing hre poland -1
                set_faction_standing hre russia -1
                set_faction_standing hre khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance hre papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction portugal
                set_faction_standing portugal england -1
                set_faction_standing portugal france -1
                set_faction_standing portugal spain -1
                set_faction_standing portugal venice -1
                set_faction_standing portugal hre -1
                set_faction_standing portugal aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing portugal poland -1
                set_faction_standing portugal russia -1
                set_faction_standing portugal khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance portugal papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction aztecs
                set_faction_standing aztecs england -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs france -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs spain -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs venice -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs hre -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs portugal -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs poland -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs russia -1
                set_faction_standing aztecs khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction poland
                set_faction_standing poland england -1
                set_faction_standing poland france -1
                set_faction_standing poland spain -1
                set_faction_standing poland venice -1
                set_faction_standing poland hre -1
                set_faction_standing poland portugal -1
                set_faction_standing poland aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing poland russia -1
                set_faction_standing poland khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance poland papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland russia war
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction russia
                set_faction_standing russia england -1
                set_faction_standing russia france -1
                set_faction_standing russia spain -1
                set_faction_standing russia venice -1
                set_faction_standing russia hre -1
                set_faction_standing russia portugal -1
                set_faction_standing russia aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing russia poland -1
                set_faction_standing russia khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance russia papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia khand war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_faction_standing khand england -1
                set_faction_standing khand france -1
                set_faction_standing khand spain -1
                set_faction_standing khand venice -1
                set_faction_standing khand hre -1
                set_faction_standing khand portugal -1
                set_faction_standing khand aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing khand poland -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance khand papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand poland war
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order england -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order france -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order spain -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order venice -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order hre -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order portugal -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order aztecs -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order poland -1
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order khand -1
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order england war
				console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order papal_states war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order france war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order spain war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order venice war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order hre war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order portugal war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order aztecs war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order poland war
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order khand war
            end_if
            console_command message_collation_set off
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### Unleash Sauron ######
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        and IsRegionOneOf Udun_Province
        if I_EventCounter EvilFaction != 1
            and ! I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
			and ! I_LocalFaction khand
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ui_flash_stop
        if I_EventCounter ring_deliver = 1
            and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
            and I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
            if ! I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                and ! I_LocalFaction aztecs
                console_command create_mission giveRingSauron
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction aztecs
                set_religion aztecs catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron aztecs
                set_religion aztecs wildmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                set_religion teutonic_order catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron teutonic_order
                set_religion teutonic_order wildmen
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction spain
                set_religion spain catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron spain
                set_religion spain orthodox
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction venice
                set_religion venice catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron venice
                set_religion venice orthodox
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_religion khand catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron khand
                set_religion khand orthodox
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction russia
                set_religion russia catholic
                create_mission giveRingSauron russia
                set_religion russia kings
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event MissionFinished MissionID giveRingSauron
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            set_counter endRing 1
            set_counter ring_possession 6
            create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Halberds,	num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruks,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Orc Raiders,	num 4, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Orc Maulers,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Morannon Guard,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Black Uruk Archers,		num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            create_unit sauron_1, Olog-hai,		num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
            console_command give_ancillary Sauron one_ring2
            reposition_character sauron_1, 370, 232
            console_command message_collation_set on
            console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england milan war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england turks war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england moors war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england norway war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england denmark war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england timurids war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england normans war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england hungary war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england saxons war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england ireland war
            console_command diplomatic_stance england byzantium war
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
			set_event_counter OneRingDestroyed 1
            if not I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                console_command diplomatic_stance england teutonic_order war
                if I_LocalFaction england
                    console_command message_collation_set off
                    historic_event sauron_ai event/sauron.bik
                    add_money england 30000
                    terminate_monitor
                end_if
            end_if
            ui_flash_stop
            set_event_counter ring_deliver 0
            historic_event sauron_ai event/sauron.bik
            console_command add_money 10000
            add_money england 10000
            increment_kings_purse england 2500
            if I_LocalFaction france
                set_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard -1
                set_event_counter saruman_ring_event -1
                set_faction_standing france england 1
                set_faction_standing england france 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance france england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction portugal
                set_faction_standing portugal england 1
                set_faction_standing england portugal 1
				set_faction_standing portugal papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states portugal 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance portugal england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction poland
                set_faction_standing poland england 1
                set_faction_standing england poland 1
				set_faction_standing poland papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states poland 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance poland england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction venice
                set_faction_standing venice england 1
                set_faction_standing england venice 1
				set_faction_standing venice papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states venice 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance venice england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction spain
                set_faction_standing spain england 1
                set_faction_standing england spain 1
				set_faction_standing spain papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states spain 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance spain england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction russia
                set_faction_standing russia england 1
                set_faction_standing england russia 1
				set_faction_standing russia papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states russia 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance russia england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction aztecs
                set_faction_standing aztecs england 1
                set_faction_standing england aztecs 1
				set_faction_standing aztecs papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states aztecs 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance aztecs england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction hre
                set_faction_standing hre england 1
                set_faction_standing england hre 1
				set_faction_standing hre papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states hre 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance hre england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction khand
                set_faction_standing khand england 1
                set_faction_standing england khand 1
				set_faction_standing khand papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states khand 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance khand england allied
            end_if
            if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
                set_faction_standing teutonic_order england 1
                set_faction_standing england teutonic_order 1
				set_faction_standing teutonic_order papal_states 1
				set_faction_standing papal_states teutonic_order 1
                console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order england allied
            end_if
            console_command message_collation_set off
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType Saruman_ring_choice_accepted
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter Saruman_ring_choice_awaiting_answer 0
		historic_event saruman_ring_mordor
		
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType Saruman_ring_choice_declined
        and EventCounter = 1
		
        set_counter Saruman_ring_choice_awaiting_answer 0
		historic_event saruman_ring_isengard
		
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
    monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition
        if I_LocalFaction France
            if I_CompareCounter Saruman_ring_choice_awaiting_answer = 1
                campaign_wait 0.1
                historic_event Saruman_ring_choice true
            end_if
        end_if
        if not I_LocalFaction France
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor


    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;############### Part 4: Saruman keeps the One Ring ##################
	
    monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and Trait Saruman > 0
        and I_LocalFaction France
        and I_EventCounter Saruman_ring_choice_declined = 1
		
		e_select_character
		
        set_counter endRing 1
        set_counter ring_timer 0
        set_event_counter ring_deliver 0
        set_event_counter RingPossession 1
        set_counter ring_possession 6

        set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0

        historic_event saruman_ring_event
        add_money france 15000
        increment_kings_purse france 2500

        historic_event nazgul_leave_sauron
        set_counter nazgula_timer 0
        set_counter nazgulb_timer 0
        set_counter nazgulc_timer 0
        set_counter nazguld_timer 0
        set_counter nazgule_timer 0
        set_counter nazgulf_timer 0
        set_counter nazgulg_timer 0
        set_counter nazgulh_timer 0
        set_counter nazguli_timer 0

        set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1
        set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
        set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1

        console_command remove_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring

        ;change_battle_model france leader saruman_manycolours
        console_command message_collation_set on
        console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring2
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring2 ;Saruman had 8 ancillaries, so he couldn't acquire the new ancillary
            console_command remove_ancillary saruman_1 saruman_ring
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 one_ring2
        end_if
        console_command give_trait saruman_1 Saruman 2
        console_command give_trait saruman_1 SarumanEpithet 2
        set_faction_standing france mongols -1
        set_faction_standing france turks -1
        set_faction_standing france milan -1
        set_faction_standing france sicily -1
        set_faction_standing france england -1
        set_faction_standing france portugal -1
        set_faction_standing france denmark -1
        set_faction_standing france poland -1
		set_faction_standing france papal_states -1
        set_faction_standing mongols france -1
        set_faction_standing saxons france -1
        set_faction_standing turks france -1
        set_faction_standing milan france -1
        set_faction_standing sicily france -1
        set_faction_standing england france -1
        set_faction_standing portugal france -1
        set_faction_standing denmark france -1
        set_faction_standing poland france -1
		set_faction_standing papal_states france -1
        console_command diplomatic_stance france mongols war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france saxons war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france turks war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france milan war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france sicily war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france england war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france portugal war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france denmark war
        console_command diplomatic_stance france poland war
		console_command diplomatic_stance france papal_states war
        console_command message_collation_set off

        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;###### Post saruman ring event
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
        and I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event != 0
        if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if

        ;### give Saruman the ancillaries that he should have had
        if ! I_WorldwideAncillaryExists saruman_ring
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 saruman_ring
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 5
            and ! I_WorldwideAncillaryExists master_of_nazguls
            console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 master_of_nazguls
        end_if

        ;### Immortal Nazguls - Isengard
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman > 0
            and I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = france
            and I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_isengard < 139
            inc_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard 1
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_isengard = 139
            and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists saruman_ring
            and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists master_of_nazguls
            terminate_monitor
        end_if

        set_event_counter RingPossession 1
        inc_counter ring_timer 1

        ;### Nazguls join Saruman
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman < 5
            and I_CompareCounter ring_timer > 9
            and I_SettlementOwner Nan_Curunir = france
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 4
                and I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 70
                historic_event nazgul_join_saruman
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgula, named character, age 41, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul1, label n1
                    traits		Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 4, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 2, NightBattleCapable 1
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n1 ring_witchking
                console_command give_ancillary n1 witchking_flail
                console_command give_ancillary n1 witchking_helmet
				console_command give_ancillary n1 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n1 NazgulEpithet 1
                send_character_off_map n1
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n1, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary saruman_1 master_of_nazguls
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 3
                and I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 60
                historic_event nazgul_join_saruman
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazguld, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul4, label n4
                    traits	Nazgul 4, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 2, NightBattleCapable 1, StrategyChivalryEvil 1, NazgulEpithet 4
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_ancillary n4 ring_nazguld
                console_command give_ancillary n4 blade_khamul
				console_command give_ancillary n4 nazgul_robe
                send_character_off_map n4
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n4, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 2
                and I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 45
                historic_event nazgul_join_saruman
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulg, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul7, label n7
                    traits	Nazgul 7, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n7 ring_nazgulg
                console_command give_ancillary n7 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n7 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n7 NazgulEpithet 7
                send_character_off_map n7
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n7, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulh, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul8, label n8
                    traits	Nazgul 8, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n8 ring_nazgulh
                console_command give_ancillary n8 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n8 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n8 NazgulEpithet 8
                send_character_off_map n8
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n8, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazguli, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul9, label n9
                    traits	Nazgul 9, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n9 ring_nazguli
                console_command give_ancillary n9 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n9 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n9 NazgulEpithet 9
                send_character_off_map n9
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n9, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 1
                and I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 25
                historic_event nazgul_join_saruman
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulc, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul3, label n3
                    traits	Nazgul 3, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n3 ring_nazgulc
                console_command give_ancillary n3 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n3 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n3 NazgulEpithet 3
                send_character_off_map n3
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n3, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulf, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul6, label n6
                    traits	Nazgul 6, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n6 ring_nazgulf
                console_command give_ancillary n6 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n6 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n6 NazgulEpithet 6
                send_character_off_map n6
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n6, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman = 0
                historic_event nazgul_join_saruman
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label n2
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n2 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary n2 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n2 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n2 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map n2
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n2, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgule, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul5, label n5
                    traits	Nazgul 5, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary n5 ring_nazgule
                console_command give_ancillary n5 nazgul_sword
				console_command give_ancillary n5 nazgul_robe
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait n5 NazgulEpithet 5
                send_character_off_map n5
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	n5, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CeasedFactionLeader Trait Saruman > 0
        if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
            set_event_counter saruman_ring_event -1
            set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
            set_counter ring_timer 0
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
            increment_kings_purse france -4500
            destroy_units france Nazg Hai
            set_counter keep_ring_isengard 0
            set_counter nazgula_timer 13
            set_counter nazgulb_timer 13
            set_counter nazgulc_timer 13
            set_counter nazguld_timer 13
            set_counter nazgule_timer 13
            set_counter nazgulf_timer 13
            set_counter nazgulg_timer 13
            set_counter nazgulh_timer 13
            set_counter nazguli_timer 13
            if I_EventCounter nazgul_join_saruman > 0
                historic_event nazgul_leave_isengard
                if I_CharacterExists n1
                    kill_character n1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgula_f1
                    kill_character nazgula_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgula_f2
                    kill_character nazgula_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgula_f3
                    kill_character nazgula_f3
                end_if

                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f2
                    kill_character nazgulg_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f3
                    kill_character nazgulg_f3
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f4
                    kill_character nazgulg_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f5
                    kill_character nazgulg_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f6
                    kill_character nazgulg_f6
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f7
                    kill_character nazgulg_f7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f8
                    kill_character nazgulg_f8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f9
                    kill_character nazgulg_f9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f10
                    kill_character nazgulg_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f11
                    kill_character nazgulg_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f12
                    kill_character nazgulg_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f13
                    kill_character nazgulg_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f14
                    kill_character nazgulg_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulg_f15
                    kill_character nazgulg_f15
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists n8
                    kill_character n8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f1
                    kill_character nazgulh_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f2
                    kill_character nazgulh_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f3

                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f4
                    kill_character nazgulh_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f5
                    kill_character nazgulh_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f6
                    kill_character nazgulh_f6

                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f7
                    kill_character nazgulh_f7
                end_if

                    kill_character nazgulh_f8

                    kill_character nazgulh_f9

                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f10
                    kill_character nazgulh_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f11
                    kill_character nazgulh_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f12
                    kill_character nazgulh_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f13
                    kill_character nazgulh_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f14
                    kill_character nazgulh_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazgulh_f15
                    kill_character nazgulh_f15
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists n9
                    kill_character n9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f1
                    kill_character nazguli_f1
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f2
                    kill_character nazguli_f2
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f3
                    kill_character nazguli_f3
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f4
                    kill_character nazguli_f4
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f5
                    kill_character nazguli_f5
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f6
                    kill_character nazguli_f6
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f7
                    kill_character nazguli_f7
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f8
                    kill_character nazguli_f8
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f9
                    kill_character nazguli_f9
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f10
                    kill_character nazguli_f10
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f11
                    kill_character nazguli_f11
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f12
                    kill_character nazguli_f12
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f13
                    kill_character nazguli_f13
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f14
                    kill_character nazguli_f14
                end_if
                if I_CharacterExists nazguli_f15
                    kill_character nazguli_f15
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        set_event_counter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard -1
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;######################## Script: One Ring ###########################
    ;######################### Part 5: Mordor ############################

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter endRing != -2
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        set_counter rptesting 1

        ;###### Part A: ring timers
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            and I_CompareCounter endRing = 0
            set_counter rptesting -1
            inc_counter ring_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 25
                ui_flash_stop
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer >= 25
                if I_SettlementOwner Shire_North = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Shire_North
                    snap_strat_camera 133, 385
                    historic_event one_ring_hobbiton
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    point_at_settlement Imladris
                    snap_strat_camera 246, 384
                    historic_event one_ring_imladris
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Bree = normans
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 130, 257
                    point_at_settlement Bree
                    historic_event one_ring_bree
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Elven_Mirkwood = mongols
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 325, 413
                    point_at_settlement Elven_Mirkwood
                    historic_event one_ring_thranduil
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dale = scotland
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 328, 417
                    point_at_settlement Dale
                    historic_event one_ring_dale
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
                    and RandomPercent <= 6
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 339, 421
                    point_at_settlement Erebor
                    historic_event one_ring_erebor
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = saxons
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 81, 382
                    point_at_settlement Mithlond
                    historic_event one_ring_mithlond
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Dorwinion = byzantium
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 441, 339
                    point_at_settlement Dorwinion
                    historic_event one_ring_carassant
                end_if
                if I_CompareCounter ring_timer != 0
                    and I_SettlementOwner Nan_i_Naugrim = hungary
                    and RandomPercent <= 8
                    set_counter ring_timer 0
                    snap_strat_camera 66, 443
                    point_at_settlement Nan_i_Naugrim
                    historic_event one_ring_thorin
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter rptesting = 1
            if I_CompareCounter ring_timer > 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0
                set_counter ring_timer 0
            end_if

            ;###### Part B: Ring Possession Test
            spawn_army
                faction scripts
                character	TemporaryRing, named character,  age 25, x 390, y 482
                unit		Nazg Hai	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                console_command give_ancillary TemporaryRing gollum
            end_if
            give_everything_to_faction scripts england false
            console_command mp TemporaryRing -1
            move TemporaryRing, 389, 482
            set_counter rptesting 0
            if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
                console_command remove_ancillary TemporaryRing one_ring
                select_character TemporaryRing ; Terminate Gollum monitor
                kill_character TemporaryRing
                set_counter ring_possession 6
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            kill_character TemporaryRing
        end_if

        ;###### Part C: We don't have the One Ring
        if I_EventCounter RingPossession = 0
            set_counter ring_possession 0
        end_if

        ;###### Part D: We have the One Ring
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = -1
            create_mission giveRingSauron england
            set_counter ring_possession 30
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 1
            historic_event one_ring_acquired_evil
			inc_counter pope_timer 110
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter ring_possession = 2
            historic_event ring_deliver2
        end_if
        set_event_counter RingPossession 0 ;cannot invade themselves
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterTurnEndInSettlement SettlementName Gorgoroth
        and HasAncType relic_ring
        and FactionType england
        if not I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter endRing = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        set_counter ring_possession -2
    end_monitor

    ;###### The Destruction of Mordor ######

    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement TargetFactionType england
        if I_EventCounter mount_doom = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
			if I_LocalFaction england
                console_command kill_faction england ;campaign ends
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter sauron_lost = 1
                set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
                set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
                set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
                terminate_monitor
            end_if
            set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        if I_LocalFaction england
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            set_counter endRing 1
            set_counter ring_timer 0
            set_event_counter ring_deliver 0

            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1

            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
                set_event_counter ring_betrayal 1

                set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0

                set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
                set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0

                historic_event nazgul_flee
            end_if

            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
                historic_event saruman_triumphs
            end_if
			
			destroy_units england Sauron
            console_command kill_faction england
			
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType relic_ring
        and I_EventCounter ring_betrayal = 1
        console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
        if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum
            console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
        end_if

        set_event_counter one_ring_hobbiton 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_imladris 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_minastirith 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_edoras 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolamroth 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_hornburg 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_bree 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thranduil 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dale 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_erebor 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mithlond 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carasgaladhon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carassant 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_thorin 0

        set_event_counter one_ring_isengard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_duneard 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_shedun 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_carndum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_khazaddum 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_goblintown 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_umbar 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_gobelancalimon 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_mistrand 0
        set_event_counter one_ring_dolguldur 0

        historic_event one_ring_betrayal

        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    monitor_event CeasedFactionLeader Trait Sauron = 1
        set_event_counter sauron_ai 0
        if I_EventCounter mount_doom = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
        set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
        if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event = 1
            set_event_counter RingPossession 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_leave_sauron 0
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        historic_event sauron_lost event/sauronlost.bik
        if I_NumberOfSettlements england = 0
            and I_EventCounter EvilFaction = 1
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 1
            end_if
            if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            end_if
            set_event_counter mordor_destroyed 1
            campaign_wait 0.1
            destroy_units england Sauron
            console_command kill_faction england
        end_if
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

    ;###################### Script: Nazguls #####################
	
;nazgul off map	
    monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	   and FactionType england		
            send_character_off_map z1
            send_character_off_map z2
            send_character_off_map z3
            send_character_off_map z7
            send_character_off_map z8
		    terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_witchking
		historic_event witch_king
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgulb
		historic_event gan_altan
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

		historic_event balaknar
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

		historic_event khamul
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgule
		historic_event lagoren
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgulf
		historic_event aglarakhor
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazgulg
		historic_event shivuus
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

		historic_event zagar
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event CharacterSelected HasAncType ring_nazguli
		historic_event leofric
		terminate_monitor
    end_monitor
	
;Human Mordor Nazgul Return
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	   and FactionType england	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 50
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 371, y 235, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label z1
                unit		Temple Knights				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_5
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
		    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType england	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 40
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 373, y 227, portrait nazgul2, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z2
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_4
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
		    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType england	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 30
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulc, named character, age 16, x 369, y 226, portrait nazgul3, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z3
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_3
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
		    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType england	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 20
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulg, named character, age 16, x 377, y 228, portrait nazgul7, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z7
                unit		Temple Wards				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_2

		    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal						
	   and FactionType england	
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 10
            spawn_army
                faction england
                character	Nazgulh, named character, age 16, x 373, y 226, portrait nazgul8, battle_model mounted_nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul, label z8
                unit		Temple Marksmen				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
            end
		    historic_event nazgul_return_1
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		    terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
;AI Mordor Nazgul Unlocked
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	   and not FactionType england
	   and not FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 35
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal	
	   and not FactionType england
	   and not FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 30
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal	
	   and not FactionType england
	   and not FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 25
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal	
	   and not FactionType england
	   and not FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 20
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal	
	   and not FactionType england
	   and not FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 10
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
;Human Gondor Nazgul Unlocked	
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	   and FactionType sicily
	    and I_TurnNumber >= 1
			console_command remove_trait z1 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z2 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z3 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z7 NazgulLocked
			console_command remove_trait z8 NazgulLocked
		   terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
;Witch-king to Angmar	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
		if I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = portugal
			and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = portugal
			and I_SettlementOwner Carn_Dum = portugal
			and not I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
			historic_event nazgul_setoff_carndum
			set_event_counter WKcangotoCD 1
			set_counter nazgula_timer 5
			if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
				if I_CharacterExists z1
					kill_character z1
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r1
					kill_character nazgula_r1
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r2
					kill_character nazgula_r2
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r3
					kill_character nazgula_r3
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r4
					kill_character nazgula_r4
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r5
					kill_character nazgula_r5
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r6
					kill_character nazgula_r6
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r7
					kill_character nazgula_r7
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r8
					kill_character nazgula_r8
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r9
					kill_character nazgula_r9
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r10
					kill_character nazgula_r10
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r11
					kill_character nazgula_r11
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r12
					kill_character nazgula_r12
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r13
					kill_character nazgula_r13
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r14
					kill_character nazgula_r14
				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r15
					kill_character nazgula_r15
				end_if

				end_if
				if I_CharacterExists nazgula_r60
					kill_character nazgula_r60
				end_if
			end_if
			terminate_monitor
		end_if
	end_monitor
	
    ; This "script" is linked with the "One Ring"
    declare_counter respawn_nazgul
    declare_counter nazgula_timer
    declare_counter nazgulb_timer
    declare_counter nazgulc_timer
    declare_counter nazgulg_timer
    declare_counter nazgulh_timer
    declare_counter nazguli_timer
    declare_counter nazgula_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulb_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulc_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulg_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulh_reborn
    declare_counter nazguli_reborn
    declare_counter nr_Mordor
    declare_counter nazguld_timer
    declare_counter nazgule_timer
    declare_counter nazgulf_timer
    declare_counter nazguld_reborn
    declare_counter nazgule_reborn
    declare_counter nazgulf_reborn
    declare_counter nr_DGolgur

    ; Dol Guldur Destroyed
    monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement TargetFactionType poland
        campaign_wait 0.1
        if I_NumberOfSettlements poland = 0
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_dolguldur -1
            if I_EventCounter saruman_ring_event < 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls 2
                if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 0
                    and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed = 0
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 13
                    end_if
                    if I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 13
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
                set_event_counter KillSauronNazguls -1
            end_if
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;###### Sauron's Nazguls
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
        and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
        and I_EventCounter nazgul_leave_sauron = 0
        if I_EventCounter sauron_lost = 1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        ;*********** DG Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur < 3
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguld
                and I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguld_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazguld_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgule
                and I_CompareCounter nazgule_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgule_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgule_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgule_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulf
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulf_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulf_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
                        set_counter nazgulf_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulf_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
                and I_NumberOfSettlements poland > 0
                if I_SettlementOwner Deep_Mirkwood = poland
                    historic_event nazgul_returned_dolguldur
                end_if
                set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
            end_if
        end_if
        ;*********** Mordor Nazguls ************
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor < 6
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_witchking
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn < 60
                inc_counter nazgula_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgula_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
						if not I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
							set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter WKcangotoCD = 1
							historic_event nazgul_returned_carndum
                            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
							set_event_counter WKcangotoCD 0
                        end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 40
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulb_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulc
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 30
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulc_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulc_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulc_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulc_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulg
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 20
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulg_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulg_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulg_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulg_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulh
	            and I_TurnNumber >= 10
                and I_CompareCounter nazgulh_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazgulh_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazgulh_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazgulh_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
            if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazguli
                and I_CompareCounter nazguli_reborn < 50
                inc_counter nazguli_timer 1
                if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer >= 7
                    if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
                        set_counter nazguli_timer 14
                    end_if
                    if I_CompareCounter nazguli_timer = 14
                        set_counter respawn_nazgul 1
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter respawn_nazgul = 1
            historic_event nazgul_returned_mordor
            set_counter respawn_nazgul 0
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nr_Mordor = 6
            and I_CompareCounter nr_DGolgur = 3
            set_event_counter nazgul_returned_mordor -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
    end_monitor

	monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_carndum
		set_counter nazgula_timer 0
		inc_counter nazgula_reborn 1
		spawn_army
			faction portugal
			character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 204, y 453, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_p1
			traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
			unit		Guardians of Carn Dum		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
		end
		if not I_LocalFaction portugal
		console_command give_trait nazgula_p1 AIBoost 1
		end_if
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 ring_witchking
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_flail
		console_command give_ancillary nazgula_p1 witchking_helmet
		terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_mordor
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_mordor = -1
            set_counter nr_Mordor 6
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nazgula_timer = 14
            set_counter nazgula_timer 0
            inc_counter nazgula_reborn 1
			if I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn = 60
				spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 370, y 232, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_r60
					traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
					unit		Temple Knights		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit 		Orc Band		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Orc Scouts		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				if not I_LocalFaction england
					console_command give_trait nazgula_r60 AIBoost 1
				end_if
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 ring_witchking
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 witchking_flail
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r60 witchking_helmet
            end_if			
			if I_CompareCounter nazgula_reborn = 59
				spawn_army
					faction england
					character	Nazgula, named character, age 16, x 370, y 232, direction W, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label nazgula_r59
					traits	Nazgul 1, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityWitchKing 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 3, GoodCommander 4, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, NazgulEpithet 1
					unit		Temple Knights		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
					unit 		Orc Band		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
					unit		Orc Scouts		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
				end
				if not I_LocalFaction england
					console_command give_trait nazgula_r59 AIBoost 1
				end_if
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r59 ring_witchking
				console_command give_ancillary nazgula_r59 witchking_flail

    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType nazgul_returned_dolguldur
        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_dolguldur = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if I_CompareCounter nazguld_timer = 14
            set_counter nazguld_timer 0
            inc_counter nazguld_reborn 1
            if I_CompareCounter nazguld_reborn = 50
