    end_monitor

    ;###### Saruman's Nazguls
    monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType ImmortalNazgulsIsengard
        if I_EventCounter ImmortalNazgulsIsengard = -1
            terminate_monitor
        end_if
        if not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_nazgulb
            and I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer < 340
            inc_counter nazgulb_timer 1
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 340
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f17
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f17 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f17 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f17
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f17, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 320
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f16
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f16 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f16 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f16
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f16, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 300
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f15
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f15 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f15 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f15 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f15
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f15, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 280
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f14
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f14 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f14 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f14 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f14
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f14, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 260
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f13
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f13 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f13 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f13 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f13
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f13, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 240
                spawn_army
                    faction scripts
                    character	Nazgulb, named character, age 16, x 224, y 276, portrait nazgul2, label nazgulb_f12
                    traits	Nazgul 2, Hero 1, NazgulRace 1, HeroAbilityNazgul 1, GoodCommander 2, GoodAttacker 1, NightBattleCapable 1, FearGeneral 1, BattleFear 2
                    unit		Temple Knights		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f12 ring_nazgulb
                console_command give_ancillary nazgulb_f12 nazgul_sword
                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                console_command give_trait nazgulb_f12 NazgulEpithet 2
                send_character_off_map nazgulb_f12
                spawn_army
                    faction france
                    character	nazgulb_f12, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model nazgul, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Nazgul
                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                end
                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter nazgulb_timer = 220

                                console_command give_ancillary nazgula_f1 ring_witchking
                                console_command give_ancillary nazgula_f1 witchking_flail
                                console_command give_ancillary nazgula_f1 witchking_helmet
                                give_everything_to_faction scripts france false
                                console_command give_trait nazgula_f1 NazgulEpithet 1
                                send_character_off_map nazgula_f1
                                spawn_army
                                    faction france
                                    character	nazgula_f1, named character, x 224, y 276, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King
                                    unit		Nazg Hai	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
                                end
                                historic_event nazgul_returned_isengard
                            end_if
                        end_if
                        if I_EventCounter nazgul_returned_isengard = 139
                            terminate_monitor
                        end_if
                    end_if
                end_if
            end_if
        end_if
    end_monitor


    ;#######################################################################################################################
    ;;;###### Dynamic Garrison Script: By Spice Master with help from Withwnar, adapted from original concept by TNZ #######
    ;#######################################################################################################################

    ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ;AI Test
    ;culture test

    ; 0 = northern_european
    ; 1 = southern_european
    ; 2 = greek
    ; 3 = middle_eastern
    ; 4 = eastern_european
    ; 5 = mesoamerican
    ; 6 = gondor
    ; 7 = turks
    declare_counter garrison_culture

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType northern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType southern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType greek
        set_counter garrison_culture 2
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType middle_eastern
        set_counter garrison_culture 3
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType eastern_european
        set_counter garrison_culture 4
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType mesoamerican
        set_counter garrison_culture 5
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionCultureType gondor
        set_counter garrison_culture 6
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionType turks
        set_counter garrison_culture 7
    end_monitor

	declare_counter core_Scatha		


    ;Building Requirements    
	
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Scatha
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Scatha 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Scatha
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Scatha 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Scatha
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Adorn >= 1
            set_counter core_Scatha 0
        end_if
    end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Adorn
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Adorn 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Adorn
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Adorn 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Adorn
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Adorn >= 1
            set_counter core_Adorn 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

        set_counter core_Lone_lands 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Lone_lands
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Lone_lands 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Lone_lands
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Lone_lands >= 1
            set_counter core_Lone_lands 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

    end_monitor


    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Central_Minhiriath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall
        set_counter core_Central_Minhiriath 1
    end_monitor
    monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Central_Minhiriath
        and SettlementBuildingFinished = garrison_hall_upg
        set_counter core_Central_Minhiriath 2
    end_monitor
    monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Central_Minhiriath
        and not SettlementBuildingExists <= garrison_hall_upg
		if I_CompareCounter core_Central_Minhiriath >= 1
            set_counter core_Central_Minhiriath 0
        end_if
    end_monitor

    ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    ;garrison creation

    declare_counter garrison
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Scatha_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Scatha
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Scatha = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Scatha = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Scatha "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor	
	
	
    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Adorn_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Adorn
		
        ;Tier 1

                console_command create_unit Druwaith_Iaur "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2

            end_if

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Druwaith_Iaur "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

                console_command create_unit Erebor "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Erebor = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Dwarf Garrison" 2 8 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Erebor "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Harondor "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Harondor "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Harondor "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1

                console_command create_unit Lowest_Anduin_Vale "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Lowest_Anduin_Vale "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

        if I_CompareCounter core_West_Moria = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Dwarf Garrison" 2 1 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 3 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_West_Moria = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Dwarf Garrison" 2 4 1 1
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Orc Garrison Elite" 4 6 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit West_Moria "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Oiolad "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Udun_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Udun
		
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
        and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
            console_command create_unit Udun "Orc Garrison Elite" 5 1 1 1			
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Udun = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Udun "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Udun "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Udun "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Udun "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Udun "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 4 1 1
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Udun "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Udun "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Udun "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Udun = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Udun "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Udun "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Udun "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3

            end_if

            end_if

            end_if

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Udun "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if

    end_monitor

                console_command create_unit Wildlands "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0

            end_if
        end_if

    end_monitor

    end_monitor

        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Lune
				
		;Ai Additional
        if I_SettlementOwner Lune = gundabad
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled gundabad
            console_command create_unit Lune "Orc Garrison Elite" 3 3 1 1			
        end_if		
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Lune = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Lune "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Lune "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Lune "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Lune "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Lune "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Lune "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Lune "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Lune "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Lune = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Lune "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Lune "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Lune "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Lune "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Lune "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Lune "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Lune "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Lune "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_South_Elven_Mirkwood = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_South_Elven_Mirkwood = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4

            end_if

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6

            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit South_Elven_Mirkwood "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor


    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Fanuilond_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Fanuilond
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Fanuilond = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Fanuilond = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Fanuilond "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor


    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Brethil_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Brethil
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Brethil = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Brethil = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Brethil "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor





    monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence IsTargetRegionOneOf Heorot_Province
        and I_SettlementUnderSiege Heorot
		
        ;Tier 1
        if I_CompareCounter core_Heorot = 1
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Northmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Dwarf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Elf Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Harad Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Orc Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Gondor Garrison Elite" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Dunedain Garrison" 1 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if
		
        ;Tier 2
        if I_CompareCounter core_Heorot = 2
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 0
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Northmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 1
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Dwarf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
			if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 2
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Elf Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 3
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Harad Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 4
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Orc Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 5
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Wildmen Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 6
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Gondor Garrison Elite" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
            if I_CompareCounter garrison_culture = 7
                console_command create_unit Heorot "Dunedain Garrison" 2 0 0 0
            end_if
        end_if

        set_counter garrison 1
    end_monitor

    ;###### Dynamic Garrison Script: Return To Your Tasks! Destroy Garrison #######

    monitor_event PostBattle I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
		and not WasAttacker
		and WonBattle	
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

    monitor_event PreBattleWithdrawal I_CompareCounter garrison = 1
        destroy_units moors garrison_unit
        destroy_units norway garrison_unit
        destroy_units hungary garrison_unit
        destroy_units saxons garrison_unit
        destroy_units mongols garrison_unit
        destroy_units ireland garrison_unit
        destroy_units turks garrison_unit
        destroy_units normans garrison_unit
        destroy_units milan garrison_unit
        destroy_units scotland garrison_unit
        destroy_units sicily garrison_unit
        destroy_units denmark garrison_unit
        destroy_units byzantium garrison_unit
        destroy_units spain garrison_unit
        destroy_units venice garrison_unit
        destroy_units khand garrison_unit
        destroy_units russia garrison_unit
        destroy_units england garrison_unit
        destroy_units poland garrison_unit
        destroy_units france garrison_unit
        destroy_units portugal garrison_unit
        destroy_units hre garrison_unit
        destroy_units aztecs garrison_unit
        destroy_units teutonic_order garrison_unit
        destroy_units timurids garrison_unit
        destroy_units slave garrison_unit
        destroy_units gundabad garrison_unit
        set_counter garrison 0
    end_monitor

    ;############################# Battle AI #############################

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	DaC Battle Scripts
    ;	19/10/2016
    ;	z3n
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	DaC Battle Script Counteres/Timers
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    declare_counter command_and_control
    declare_counter deploy_check
    declare_counter start_battle
    declare_counter FaW_and_S
    declare_counter Release_Labels
    declare_counter AI_GRP
    declare_counter AI_HTC
    declare_counter AI_reinforcements
    declare_counter AI_reinforcements_tc
    declare_timer AI_reinforcements_timer

    log always DaC Campaign Based Battle Scripts
    log always Activated

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	DaC Battle Script Frequency Check
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted

        inc_counter command_and_control 1

        if I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 125
            set_counter command_and_control 0
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Game Reloaded
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_event GameReloaded

        log always Game Reloaded
        set_counter deploy_check 0
        set_counter Release_Labels 0
        set_counter command_and_control 0
        set_counter AI_GRP 0
        set_counter AI_reinforcements 0
        set_counter AI_HTC 0
        set_counter AI_reinforcements_tc 0
        log always Battle Scripts Reset

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Battle Starting
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_event ScrollClosed ScrollClosed prebattle_scroll

        prepare_for_battle
        set_counter command_and_control 0
        set_counter Release_Labels 0
        set_counter AI_GRP 0
        set_counter AI_reinforcements 0
        set_counter AI_HTC 0
        set_counter deploy_check 0
        set_counter AI_reinforcements_tc 0
        restart_timer AI_reinforcements_timer

        if I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 0
            log always Battle Loading
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Battle Started
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted

        inc_counter deploy_check 1

        if I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 1
            log always Battle Started
            set_counter start_battle 1
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ;;;;*************************************************************************************************
    ;;;;	Create Labels
    ;;;;*************************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
        and I_CompareCounter start_battle = 1

        set_counter Release_Labels 1
        set_counter FaW_and_S 1

        if I_CompareCounter Release_Labels = 1
            set_counter start_battle 0
        end_if

        if I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 1
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            ;	Main Army unit	Labels
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            label_unit	0 0 0 MAu1
            label_unit	0 0 1 MAu2
            label_unit	0 0 2 MAu3
            label_unit	0 0 3 MAu4
            label_unit	0 0 4 MAu5
            label_unit	0 0 5 MAu6
            label_unit	0 0 6 MAu7
            label_unit	0 0 7 MAu8
            label_unit	0 0 8 MAu9
            label_unit	0 0 9 MAu10
            label_unit	0 0 10 MAu11
            label_unit	0 0 11 MAu12
            label_unit	0 0 12 MAu13
            label_unit	0 0 13 MAu14
            label_unit	0 0 14 MAu15
            label_unit	0 0 15 MAu16
            label_unit	0 0 16 MAu17
            label_unit	0 0 17 MAu18
            label_unit	0 0 18 MAu19
            label_unit	0 0 19 MAu20
            label_unit	0 0 20 MAu21
            label_unit	0 0 21 MAu22
            label_unit	0 0 22 MAu23
            label_unit	0 0 23 MAu24
            label_unit	0 0 24 MAu25
            label_unit	0 0 25 MAu26
            label_unit	0 0 26 MAu27
            label_unit	0 0 27 MAu28
            label_unit	0 0 28 MAu29
            label_unit	0 0 29 MAu30
            label_unit	0 0 30 MAu31
            label_unit	0 0 31 MAu32
            label_unit	0 0 32 MAu33
            label_unit	0 0 33 MAu34
            label_unit	0 0 34 MAu35
            label_unit	0 0 35 MAu36
            label_unit	0 0 36 MAu37
            label_unit	0 0 37 MAu38
            label_unit	0 0 38 MAu39
            label_unit	0 0 39 MAu40
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            ;	Allied unit	Labels
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            label_unit	1 0 0 Eu1
            label_unit	1 0 1 Eu2
            label_unit	1 0 2 Eu3
            label_unit	1 0 3 Eu4
            label_unit	1 0 4 Eu5
            label_unit	1 0 5 Eu6
            label_unit	1 0 6 Eu7
            label_unit	1 0 7 Eu8
            label_unit	1 0 8 Eu9
            label_unit	1 0 9 Eu10
            label_unit	1 0 10 Eu11
            label_unit	1 0 11 Eu12
            label_unit	1 0 12 Eu13
            label_unit	1 0 13 Eu14
            label_unit	1 0 14 Eu15
            label_unit	1 0 15 Eu16
            label_unit	1 0 16 Eu17
            label_unit	1 0 17 Eu18
            label_unit	1 0 18 Eu19
            label_unit	1 0 19 Eu20
            label_unit	1 0 20 Eu21
            label_unit	1 0 21 Eu22
            label_unit	1 0 22 Eu23
            label_unit	1 0 23 Eu24
            label_unit	1 0 24 Eu25
            label_unit	1 0 25 Eu26
            label_unit	1 0 26 Eu27
            label_unit	1 0 27 Eu28
            label_unit	1 0 28 Eu29
            label_unit	1 0 29 Eu30
            label_unit	1 0 30 Eu31
            label_unit	1 0 31 Eu32
            label_unit	1 0 32 Eu33
            label_unit	1 0 33 Eu34
            label_unit	1 0 34 Eu35
            label_unit	1 0 35 Eu36
            label_unit	1 0 36 Eu37
            label_unit	1 0 37 Eu38
            label_unit	1 0 38 Eu39
            label_unit	1 0 39 Eu40
        end_if

    end_monitor

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
        and I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfAttribute general_unit	> 0
        and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfAttribute general_unit	= 0

        if I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 1
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            ;	Help The Captain - AI
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            unit_set_experience Eu1 6
            unit_set_experience Eu2 6
            unit_set_experience Eu3 6
            unit_set_experience Eu4 6
            unit_set_experience Eu5 6
            unit_set_experience Eu6 6
            unit_set_experience Eu7 6
            unit_set_experience Eu8 6
            unit_set_experience Eu9 6
            unit_set_experience Eu10 6
            unit_set_experience Eu11 6
            unit_set_experience Eu12 6
            unit_set_experience Eu13 6
            unit_set_experience Eu14 6
            unit_set_experience Eu15 6
            unit_set_experience Eu16 6
            unit_set_experience Eu17 6
            unit_set_experience Eu18 6
            unit_set_experience Eu19 6
            unit_set_experience Eu20 6
            unit_set_experience Eu21 6
            unit_set_experience Eu22 6
            unit_set_experience Eu23 6
            unit_set_experience Eu24 6
            unit_set_experience Eu25 6
            unit_set_experience Eu26 6
            unit_set_experience Eu27 6
            unit_set_experience Eu28 6
            unit_set_experience Eu29 6
            unit_set_experience Eu30 6
            unit_set_experience Eu31 6
            unit_set_experience Eu32 6
            unit_set_experience Eu33 6
            unit_set_experience Eu34 6
            unit_set_experience Eu35 6
            unit_set_experience Eu36 6
            unit_set_experience Eu37 6
            unit_set_experience Eu38 6
            unit_set_experience Eu39 6
            unit_set_experience Eu40 6
        end_if

    end_monitor

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
        and I_CompareCounter Release_Labels = 1

        if I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 1
            ;Must release Main Army, internal army label is recalibrated upon arrival of AI reinforcements causing 1 (previously the main AI army) to become 0 and 1 to become the secondary AI army.
            release_unit	MAu1
            release_unit	MAu2
            release_unit	MAu3
            release_unit	MAu4
            release_unit	MAu5
            release_unit	MAu6
            release_unit	MAu7
            release_unit	MAu8
            release_unit	MAu9
            release_unit	MAu10
            release_unit	MAu11
            release_unit	MAu12
            release_unit	MAu13
            release_unit	MAu14
            release_unit	MAu15
            release_unit	MAu16
            release_unit	MAu17
            release_unit	MAu18
            release_unit	MAu19
            release_unit	MAu20
            release_unit	MAu21
            release_unit	MAu22
            release_unit	MAu23
            release_unit	MAu24
            release_unit	MAu25
            release_unit	MAu26
            release_unit	MAu27
            release_unit	MAu28
            release_unit	MAu29
            release_unit	MAu30
            release_unit	MAu31
            release_unit	MAu32
            release_unit	MAu33
            release_unit	MAu34
            release_unit	MAu35
            release_unit	MAu36
            release_unit	MAu37
            release_unit	MAu38
            release_unit	MAu39
            release_unit	MAu40
            release_unit	Eu1
            release_unit	Eu2
            release_unit	Eu3
            release_unit	Eu4
            release_unit	Eu5
            release_unit	Eu6
            release_unit	Eu7
            release_unit	Eu8
            release_unit	Eu9
            release_unit	Eu10
            release_unit	Eu11
            release_unit	Eu12
            release_unit	Eu13
            release_unit	Eu14
            release_unit	Eu15
            release_unit	Eu16
            release_unit	Eu17
            release_unit	Eu18
            release_unit	Eu19
            release_unit	Eu20
            release_unit	Eu21
            release_unit	Eu22
            release_unit	Eu23
            release_unit	Eu24
            release_unit	Eu25
            release_unit	Eu26
            release_unit	Eu27
            release_unit	Eu28
            release_unit	Eu29
            release_unit	Eu30
            release_unit	Eu31
            release_unit	Eu32
            release_unit	Eu33
            release_unit	Eu34
            release_unit	Eu35
            release_unit	Eu36
            release_unit	Eu37
            release_unit	Eu38
            release_unit	Eu39
            release_unit	Eu40
        end_if

    end_monitor

    monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
        and I_CompareCounter deploy_check = 1

        set_counter Release_Labels 0

        if I_CompareCounter Release_Labels = 0
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            ;	Group Labels
            ; *********************************************************************************************
            define_unit_group Allies MAu1 MAu2 MAu3 MAu4 MAu5 MAu6 MAu7 MAu8 MAu9 MAu10 MAu11 MAu12 MAu13 MAu14 MAu15 MAu16 MAu17 MAu18 MAu19 MAu20 MAu21 MAu22 MAu23 MAu24 MAu25 MAu26 MAu27 MAu28 MAu29 MAu30 MAu31 MAu32 MAu33 MAu34 MAu35 MAu36 MAu37 MAu38 MAu39 MAu40

            define_unit_group Enemy Eu1 Eu2 Eu3 Eu4 Eu5 Eu6 Eu7 Eu8 Eu9 Eu10 Eu11 Eu12 Eu13 Eu14 Eu15 Eu16 Eu17 Eu18 Eu19 Eu20 Eu21 Eu22 Eu23 Eu24 Eu25 Eu26 Eu27 Eu28 Eu29 Eu30 Eu31 Eu32 Eu33 Eu34 Eu35 Eu36 Eu37 Eu38 Eu39 Eu40

            set_counter FaW_and_S 0
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Initialize Battle Plans & Monitors
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	AI Unit Monitors
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 10
        and I_BattleStarted
        and not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
        and I_PercentageUnitKilled Eu1 > 5

        inc_counter AI_GRP 1

        ;AI Units Battle Objective
        ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
        ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
        ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	AI Reactions Toward Attacks (Missile/Artillery/Charges)
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 20
        and I_BattleStarted
        and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
        and not I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
        and I_PercentageOfArmyKilled 1 0 > 3

        inc_counter AI_GRP 1

        ;AI Units Battle Objective
        ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
        ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
        ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Normal Attack Plan
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 40
        and I_BattleStarted
        and I_ConflictType Normal
        and not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

        log always AI Normal Attack
        ;AI Units Battle Objective
        ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
        ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
        ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	Normal Defend Plan
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 50
        and I_BattleStarted
        and I_ConflictType Normal
        and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

        if I_CompareCounter AI_GRP = 0
            ;AI Units Battle Objective Main Army
            log always AI Normal Defense
            ;AI Alliance Battle Objective Main Army
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_FEATURE
        end_if

        if I_CompareCounter AI_GRP > 0
            log always AI GRP Normal Defense
            ;AI Units Battle Objective
            ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
            ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
            ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
        end_if

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	 Assault Settlement
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 70
        and I_BattleStarted
        and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
        and not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

        ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
        ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_SETTLEMENT

    end_monitor

    ; *********************************************************************************************
    ;	 Sally Out
    ; *********************************************************************************************

    monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter command_and_control = 80
        and I_BattleStarted
        and I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
        and not I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

        ;AI Units Battle Objective
        ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
        ;AI Alliance Battle Objective
        ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL

    end_monitor

    ;########################### Wait Monitors ###########################

    wait_monitors

end_script
